T02D2509:216a-1: a'a r+ya tree lo kya bi dza ya n'a ma bri tti /
T02D2509:216a-3: 'phags pa 'dzin rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa /
T02D2509:216a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo ;
T02D2509:216a-5: / gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi'am /
T02D2509:216a-6: yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam pa gnyis su gsungs te /
T02D2509:216a-7: sems can rtog pa mang ba rnams kyi don du bya ba'i rgyud rnams gsungs so //
T02D2509:216a-8: gcig kho nang rnal 'byor gyis bsgrub par 'dod pa rnams la rnal 'byor gyi rgyud rnams bshad do //
T02D2509:216a-9: gnyis ka'i rgyud dang gsum mo zhes kyang kha cig 'chad de /
T02D2509:216a-10: de yang lha'i bye brag ni gnyis su zad pas gnyi ga'i rgyud logs shig na med do //
T02D2509:216a-11: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud 'di
T02D2509:216b-0: ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du gtogs te @216b lha'i
T02D2509:216b-1: mtshan nyid dang / dam tshig la sogs pa yang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dang mthun pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2509:216b-2: de la rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni sems mnyam par bzhag pa'o //
T02D2509:216b-3: de'i mthus sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i
T02D2509:216b-4: dgos pa bsgrub pa'i phyir sngags dang phyag rgya dang
T02D2509:216b-5: dkyil 'khor dang dbang sbyin pa la sogs pa rnam
T02D2509:216b-6: pa sna tshogs pa spel zhing rgyas pas rnal 'byor
T02D2509:216b-8: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud 'di bshad pa yang gleng gzhi'i tshul bstan pa dang /
T02D2509:216b-9: rgyud kyi dngos po bstan pa'o //
T02D2509:216b-10: de la gleng gzhi'i tshul bstan pa yang rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D2509:216b-11: ston pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2509:216b-12: gnas phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2509:216b-14: de la ston pa phun sum tshogs pa ni bcom
T02D2509:216b-15: ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rgyud kyi bdag po
T02D2509:216b-16: ste / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa yang
T02D2509:216b-17: de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
T02D2509:216b-19: gnas phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
T02D2509:216b-20: ri rab ri zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2509:216b-21: ri rab ri'i steng du lha'i khang pa brtsegs ma
T02D2509:216b-22: de'i rtse mo'i phyogs rdo rje nor bu rin po
T02D2509:216b-23: che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D2509:216b-24: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa
T02D2509:216b-25: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba zhes bya ba la
T02D2509:216b-26: sogs pa'o // bye ba phrag du ma zhes bya
T02D2509:216b-27: ba ni rgyud gzhan 'chad pa'i tshe na rtag tu
T02D2509:216b-28: bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs cig
T02D2509:216b-29: tu bzhugs pas na 'dir yang de dag thabs cig
T02D2509:216b-30: tu bzhugs par shes par bya'o //
T02D2509:216b-31: lha ni lha chen po dang tshangs pa dang gtogs 'dod la sogs pa'o //
T02D2509:216b-32: klu ni 'jog po la sogs pa'o //
T02D2509:216b-33: gnod sbyin dang dri za la sogs pa ni yi dags kyi khams su gtogs pa'o //
T02D2509:216b-34: bltar rung ba zhes bya ba ni mi ma yin
T02D2509:216b-35: pa de dag mig gi rnam par shes pa'i spyod
T02D2509:216b-37: de las bzlog pa ni bltar mi rung ba ste
T02D2509:216b-38: gzugs mngon du mi ston ces bya ba'i don to
T02D2509:216b-39: // de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i
T02D2509:216b-40: chos la dad pa ste de dag dang thabs cig
T02D2509:216b-41: tu bcom ldan 'das spyod lam bzhir 'gro ba'i don
T02D2509:216b-42: mdzad cing bzhugs te de yan chad ni gleng gzhi'o
T02D2509:217a-0: // // rgyud kyi dngos po bstan pa'i phyir @217a * //
T02D2509:217a-1: gsungs pa de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2509:217a-2: rdo rje ni ye shes kyi mtshan ma ste rtse
T02D2509:217a-3: lnga ni ye shes bzhi dang de dag gi yul
T02D2509:217a-4: chos kyi dbyings dang lngar brtag go //
T02D2509:217a-5: kha gnyis su gyes pa ni phyogs bcu thams cad du khyab pa'i don to //
T02D2509:217a-6: de lta bu'i ye shes byang chub sems dpa'i 'dis
T02D2509:217a-7: lag tu thob pa dang 'dra bar mngon du byas
T02D2509:217a-8: pas na phyag na rdo rje ste ye shes dang
T02D2509:217a-9: ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2509:217a-10: rgyud 'dir dngos po de kho na nyid bcu drug gis bstan te de yang gang zhe na /
T02D2509:217a-11: snying po'i de kho na dang /
T02D2509:217a-12: phyag rgya'i de kho na dang /
T02D2509:217a-13: sngags kyi de kho na dang /
T02D2509:217a-14: rang rig pa'i de kho na dang /
T02D2509:217a-15: de bzhin du byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2509:217a-18: mchod pa'i de kho na dang /
T02D2509:217a-19: bdag gi de kho na dang /
T02D2509:217a-21: dam tshig dang dkyil 'khor dang shes rab dang /
T02D2509:217a-22: thabs dang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i de kho na rnams so //
T02D2509:217a-23: de kho na zhes bya ba ni don dam pa dang /
T02D2509:217a-24: kun rdzob rnam pa gnyis de chos kyi rang bzhin
T02D2509:217a-25: phyin ci ma log pa brjod du med pa'i ngo
T02D2509:217a-26: bo ni don dam pa'i de kho na'o //
T02D2509:217a-27: de lta mod kyi kun rdzob tu 'jig rten gyi tha snyad dang sbyar na /
T02D2509:217a-28: mi slu bar dgos pa bsgrub pas na de kho na zhes bya ste /
T02D2509:217a-29: bcu drug po de rnams kyis ji ltar rigs par don grub par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2509:217a-30: 'di rnams kyang ji ltar rigs par sbyar gyi rim bzhin du sbyar ba ni ma yin no //
T02D2509:217a-31: de la snying po ni rigs lnga so so'i snying
T02D2509:217a-32: po yi ge 'bru gcig la sogs pa gsungs pa'o
T02D2509:217a-33: // phyag rgya ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T02D2509:217a-35: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2509:217a-36: chos kyi phyag rgya dang las kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa'o //
T02D2509:217a-37: de la phyag rgya chen po ni lha rnams kyi lus kyi tshul bstan pa ste /
T02D2509:217a-38: lus kyi sgo nas lha'i tshul gsal bar bsgom pa'i
T02D2509:217a-39: rgyur che bas na phyag rgya chen po zhes bya'o
T02D2509:217a-40: // dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni lha rnams kyi sems kyi tshul bstan pa ste /
T02D2509:217a-41: sems kyi rnam par thar pa'i mtshan ma phyag rgyar
T02D2509:217a-42: bstan pas lha rnams kyang de las mi 'da' bas
T02D2509:217a-43: na dam tshig gi phyag rgyar bstan pas dam tshig
T02D2509:217a-45: chos kyi phyag rgya ni lha rnams kyi tshig gi tshul bstan pa ste /
T02D2509:217b-0: lha rnams @217b kyi tshig don dam pa'i chos thams cad ston pa'o //
T02D2509:217b-1: las kyi phyag rgya ni spyod pa'i tshul bstan pa ste /
T02D2509:217b-2: phyag rgya rdo rje khu tshur gnyis su dral ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2509:217b-3: sngags ni shes pa dang skyob par ldan pas na sngags te /
T02D2509:217b-4: don ma nor bar shes pas ngan song gsum las skyob pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2509:217b-5: de yang lha'i sku gzugs skyes pa'i cha lugs 'dzin pa rnams kyis gsungs pa'i tshig rnams so //
T02D2509:217b-6: rig pa ni ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad
T02D2509:217b-7: sel ba'i phyir lha bud med kyi tshul du bzhugs
T02D2509:217b-8: pa'i tshe gsungs pa'i tshig rnams so //
T02D2509:217b-9: byin gyis brlab pa ni rnam pa gnyis te rang bzhin gyis byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2509:217b-11: byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga yang bdag rang phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor la gnas shing /
T02D2509:217b-12: dam tshig dang dbab pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas lha gnas par bya'o //
T02D2509:217b-13: dbang bskur ba ni rnam pa gnyis te sangs rgyas
T02D2509:217b-14: bcom ldan 'das rnams la ni mchod pa'i don du
T02D2509:217b-15: me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pas dbang bskur
T02D2509:217b-16: ba'o // byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa ni
T02D2509:217b-17: sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan gyis dbang bskur ba dang
T02D2509:217b-18: ba'o // / ming gis dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2509:217b-19: ting nge 'dzin ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo yid la byed pa'o //
T02D2509:217b-20: mchod pa ni bdag dang gzhan la mchod pa ste
T02D2509:217b-21: phyi nang gi mchod pa rnam pa brgyad la sogs
T02D2509:217b-22: pa'o // bdag gi de kho na ni bdag gi rang bzhin phyin ci ma log pa ste /
T02D2509:217b-23: chos la bdag med pa'i rang bzhin mi skye mi 'gog pa stod pa nyid do //
T02D2509:217b-24: lha'i de kho na ni don dam pa dang kun rdzob rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2509:217b-25: don dam par na lha'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi gnyis pa'o //
T02D2509:217b-26: kun rdzob tu ni yan lag thams cad ldan par skyes pa dang bud med dang /
T02D2509:217b-27: khro bo dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i gzugs su snang ba'o //
T02D2509:217b-28: dam tshig ni spyir sngags pa thams cad kyis bsrung ba dang /
T02D2509:217b-29: rigs tha dad pa'i dam tshig tha dad par bsrung ba rnams so //
T02D2509:217b-30: dkyil 'khor ni rigs re re zhing yang dkyil 'khor
T02D2509:217b-31: bzhi la sogs pa re re yang bzhi bzhir bshad
T02D2509:217b-32: pa'o // shes rab ni chos rab tu shes pa
T02D2509:217b-33: ste de kho na bcu drug la sogs pa'i mtshan
T02D2509:218a-2: thabs kyis sems can ji lta bus 'dul ba de lta bu'i gzugs ston pa dang /
T02D2509:218a-3: dgos pa ci lta bus 'grub pa de lta bu'i rgyus sgrub pa'o //
T02D2509:218a-4: rgyu zhes bya ba ni gcig tu na byang chub
T02D2509:218a-5: sems dpa'i sa bcu ni sangs rgyas kyi rgyu yin
T02D2509:218a-6: pas na de'i mtshan nyid bshad pa ni rgyu bstan
T02D2509:218a-7: pa'o // 'bras bu ni sangs rgyas kyis te sa bcu rnams kyi 'bras bur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2509:218a-8: gzhan du na rgyu zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi 'bras bu 'thob par byed pa'i rgyu ste /
T02D2509:218a-9: bzlas pa dang sgom pa la sogs pa sngags kyi
T02D2509:218a-10: 'bras bu grub pa rab 'bring la sogs pa sgrub
T02D2509:218a-11: pa'o // 'bras bu ni bzlas pa dang bsgoms pa
T02D2509:218a-12: la sogs pa'i 'bras bu ste rig 'dzin la sogs
T02D2509:218a-14: zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sogs pa las kyi rnams so //
T02D2509:218a-15: de nas lha chen po la sogs pa gdul zhing
T02D2509:218a-16: dam tshig stsal bar skabs la bab par mkhyen nas
T02D2509:218a-17: phyag na rdo rje nam mkha' las babs te bcom
T02D2509:218a-18: ldan 'das la gsol ba btab po //
T02D2509:218a-19: nam mkha' las babs pa ni don dam par chos
T02D2509:218a-20: thams cad nam mkha' lta bu ste stong pa nyid
T02D2509:218a-21: kyi rang bzhin las kun rdzob kyi bden pa la
T02D2509:218a-22: gnas te / sems can gyi don gyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs su 'byung bar ston te /
T02D2509:218a-23: 'dis ni dngos po med pa'i chos las dngos po med pa'i chos 'byung bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2509:218a-24: gzhan yang 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyi nang na
T02D2509:218a-25: phyag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan
T02D2509:218a-27: bcom ldan 'das la phyag rgya zhing lan gsum bskor
T02D2509:218a-28: ba ni skyes bu dam pa ya rabs kyi tshul
T02D2509:218a-29: bstan pa ste / 'jig rten na yang bla 'og
T02D2509:218a-30: gi rim pa ni ya rabs rnams la yod pas
T02D2509:218a-31: na ya rabs kyi chos yin te /
T02D2509:218a-32: ma rabs mnyam pa brgya bong bu ded pa rnams
T02D2509:218a-33: dang dud 'gro rnams la bla 'og dang btsun mi
T02D2509:218a-34: btsun gyi rim pa med do //
T02D2509:218a-35: bcom ldan 'das lha chen po la sogs pa sems
T02D2509:218a-36: can ma rungs pa de dag dam tshig 'dzin du
T02D2509:218a-37: stsal bar 'tshal zhes gsungs pa la /
T02D2509:218a-38: de kho na bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi nang nas lha
T02D2509:218a-39: chen po thabs sna tshogs kyis btul ba lags na
T02D2509:218b-0: yang 'dir lha chen po bdud @218b btul ba'i thabs
T02D2509:218b-1: bsham pa ci 'tshal zhes skabs tshol ba bsal ba'i
T02D2509:218b-3: sngar lha chen po btul zin nas yang lha chen po la sogs pa 'dul lo //
T02D2509:218b-5: las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lha
T02D2509:218b-6: chen po snga ma ni de kho na bsdus pa'i
T02D2509:218b-7: rgyud las 'byung ba bzhin du sngar btul lo //
T02D2509:218b-8: 'dir ni yang las kyi rnam par smin pa las
T02D2509:218b-9: skyes pa'i lha chen po gzhan 'dul bar bzhed do
T02D2509:218b-10: // de ltar mu stegs can lha chen po rtag par 'dod pa dang ni 'gal mod kyi /
T02D2509:218b-11: 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag par grub pas na
T02D2509:218b-12: lha chen po mi rtag par grub pa la nyes
T02D2509:218b-13: pa med do // sems can ma rungs pa zhes
T02D2509:218b-14: bya ba ni skyon rnam pa gsum dang ldan pa
T02D2509:218b-15: pa med do // ste / khengs pa'i nga rgyal
T02D2509:218b-16: srel bas gzhan khyad du gsod pa dang lta ba
T02D2509:218b-17: logs pas 'phags pa'i bden pa la sogs pa don
T02D2509:218b-19: rang bzhin gyis gtum ste gzhan la snyogs shing 'dud pa can no //
T02D2509:218b-20: 'og nas 'byung ba'i ma rungs pa'ang don de ltar sbyar ro //
T02D2509:218b-21: dam tshig 'dzin tu stsal zhes bya ba ni dkyil
T02D2509:218b-22: 'khor du bcug la sngags kyi dam tshig khas len
T02D2509:218b-23: du gzhug pa'o // chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya
T02D2509:218b-24: ba ni chos thams cad la mnga' mdzad pa ste
T02D2509:218b-25: du gzhug pa'o // / chos bdag med pa'i don
T02D2509:218b-26: stod pa nyid las kyang rnam pa sna tshogs su
T02D2509:218b-28: gnod sbyin khyod shin tu khengs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2509:218b-29: gnod sbyin ni nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par byed pas na gnod sbyin zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2509:218b-30: yi dags kyi khams gnod sbyin mthu bo che thams
T02D2509:218b-31: cad kyi bdag po mdzad pas na phyag na rdo
T02D2509:218b-32: rje la yang gnod sbyin zhes gdags so //
T02D2509:218b-34: shin tu mthur ba ni bsar ba'o //
T02D2509:218b-35: de ltar rtsub cing mi srun pas sems can la ji ltar phan gdags zhes gsungs pa'o //
T02D2509:218b-36: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba shin tu
T02D2509:218b-37: khengs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don
T02D2509:218b-38: to // 'dod pa'i bde ba can zhes bya ba
T02D2509:218b-39: ni 'dod pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i sems
T02D2509:218b-40: to // can rnams te / dbang dang zhi ba
T02D2509:218b-41: dang rgyas pa'i las kyis btul zhes bya ba'i don
T02D2509:218b-42: to // can rnams te / to // gsang ba
T02D2509:218b-43: la sogs pas sbyangs te zhes bya ba bsad pa
T02D2509:218b-44: ni rang bzhin bsgyur ba la bya'o //
T02D2509:219a-1: gcod pa la mi bya ste snga ma'i rang bzhin
T02D2509:219a-2: ma rungs pa bsal te phyi ma'i rang bzhin zhi
T02D2509:219a-3: bar bsgyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2509:219a-4: don gyi phyir dang phan pa'i phyir dang bde ba'i
T02D2509:219a-5: phyir zhes pa tshe 'di la don bde ba dang
T02D2509:219a-6: phyi ma la phan pa dang mya ngan las 'das
T02D2509:219a-7: pa'i phyir zhes rim bzhin du sbyar ro//
T02D2509:219a-8: phyag na rdo rje'i snying po'i sngags la spyir na don bzhi ste byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2509:219a-11: de la aom ni rgyud kyi bdag bo rnam par
T02D2509:219a-12: snang mdzad kyi byin gyis brlabs par bstan pa ste
T02D2509:219a-13: / aa dang aur phrang pas na aom /
T02D2509:219a-14: de la aa ni aa nud pa da ste chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i don to //
T02D2509:219a-15: au ni au pa dra ba ste gnod pa med
T02D2509:219a-16: de 'tshe ba med pa zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D2509:219a-17: // klad kor ni stong pa nyid kyi don du ston to //
T02D2509:219a-19: ni su mbha ni khro ba med pa'o //
T02D2509:219a-21: des ni rang bzhin bstan te /
T02D2509:219a-22: phyag na rdo rje 'dod pa dang khro bo'i rang bzhin gdug pa thams cad sel ba'o //
T02D2509:219a-23: / ghri hna gri hna ni ma rungs pa rnams zung shig ces pa'o //
T02D2509:219a-24: ghri hn'a pa ya ni 'dzin du chug cig pa'o //
T02D2509:219a-25: a'a na ya ni khug cig pa ste de dag ni bskul ba'o //
T02D2509:219a-26: ho bha ga b'an badzra zhes bya ba ni kye
T02D2509:219a-27: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje zhes bod pa'i
T02D2509:219a-28: tshig go // h'um phat ces bya bas kyang rang
T02D2509:219a-29: bzhin bstan te phat ni gtan 'pho ba'i don du
T02D2509:219a-30: tshig go // bsnyegs pa'o // bcom ldan 'das ga
T02D2509:219a-31: la ba der lhags te zhes bya ba lha chen
T02D2509:219a-32: po la sogs pa ri rab rtse mor 'dong nus
T02D2509:219a-33: pa rnams ni bcom ldan 'das kyi tha dad du
T02D2509:219a-34: tshig go // bsnyegs pa'o // lhags so // der
T02D2509:219a-35: 'dong mi phod pa rnams kyang gling bzhi pa la
T02D2509:219a-36: so so'i yul na 'dar yed yed de 'khod do
T02D2509:219a-37: tshig go // bsnyegs pa'o // lhags so // //
T02D2509:219a-38: gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su tshogs pa'i
T02D2509:219a-39: dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba skabs 'di dag
T02D2509:219a-40: tu dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba ni rang
T02D2509:219a-41: gi 'khor ram zhabs 'bring phal po che la bya'o
T02D2509:219a-42: tshig go // bsnyegs pa'o // lhags so // // // sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2509:219a-43: sangs rgyas kun gyi byin gyis brlabs //
T02D2509:219a-44: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D2509:219a-45: kyi phyag na rdo rje'i rang bzhin bstan pa ste
T02D2509:219a-46: sems can la phan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas lnga rnams
T02D2509:219a-47: kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs shing btang pa ni kun
T02D2509:219b-0: du bzang po phyag na @219b rdo rje'o //
T02D2509:219b-1: de'ang 'dod pa dang khro ba'i rang bzhin te /
T02D2509:219b-2: khro bas ma rungs pa rnams 'dul zhing 'dod pas
T02D2509:219b-3: bde bar sbyor bas rnam pa thams cad du mdzes
T02D2509:219b-4: pa'i phyir kun du bzang po'o //
T02D2509:219b-5: de nyid kun gyi bdag po ste khams gsum gyi gtso'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2509:219b-6: de nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin las skyes pa ste sras zhes bya'i don to //
T02D2509:219b-7: sras de yang su zhe na phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin chen po'o //
T02D2509:219b-8: gnod sbyin chen po pas ni lha chen po la
T02D2509:219b-9: sogs pa ma rungs pa rnams 'chos shing 'dul ba

T02D2509:219b-11: ldan pas na phyag na rdo rje'i mtshan brjod pa

T02D2509:219b-14: dgongs pa rnam pa bzhi'i nang nas dus la dgongs pa'i don dang sbyar ro //
T02D2509:219b-15: kye gnod sbyin nga ni thams cad kyi bdag po byed pa'o //
T02D2509:219b-16: 'joms pa po zhes pa phyag na rdo rje la
T02D2509:219b-17: kye gnod sbyin zhes pos nas khams gsum thams cad
T02D2509:219b-18: kyi bdag po chen po yang nga yin /
T02D2509:219b-19: dngos po thams cad kyi dang po'i byed pa po dang 'joms shing med par byed pa dang /
T02D2509:219b-20: skye bo thams cad kyi bdag po yang nga yin /
T02D2509:219b-21: de bzhin du tshangs pa dang gtogs 'dod la sogs
T02D2509:219b-22: pa yang nga yin pas na khyod kyi ngag nga
T02D2509:219b-24: khyod ni lus srul po mi'i sha za ba zhes pa lus srul po yi dags kyi khams te /
T02D2509:219b-25: lha chen po yang yi dags kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2509:219b-26: mi'i sha za ba ni mi thod kyi nang du kha zad za ba la sogs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2509:219b-27: sha za'i lus srel ba ni mi thod dang mi
T02D2509:219b-28: rus kyis brgyan pa la sogs pa yi dags kyi
T02D2509:219b-30: tshangs pa zhes bya ba ni thar pa'o //
T02D2509:219b-31: gtogs 'dod ces bya ba ni mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2509:219b-32: tshangs pa ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis ma gos pa ste mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T02D2509:219b-33: gtogs 'dod ni dngos po thams cad kyi nad du
T02D2509:219b-34: 'jug pa ste dngos po thams cad du gtogs pa'i
T02D2509:219b-35: tshig de mi 'gyur ba ste thams cad kyi bdag
T02D2509:219b-36: nyid du bshad pa'i tshig de nges pa ste gzhan
T02D2509:219b-38: de dag gi rang bzhin ni nga nyid yin pas
T02D2509:219b-39: na khyed thams cad gdul ba'i mthu nga la yod
T02D2509:219b-41: de nas lha chen po khros nas rang gi gzugs
T02D2509:220a-0: khro bo'i mdangs chen por bstan to zhes @220a *
T02D2509:220a-2: 'jigs su rung ba chen po'i gzugs //
T02D2509:220a-3: zhes pa la sogs pa thabs cha sna tshogs kyis sdigs ru byed par ston to zhes gsungs pa /
T02D2509:220a-4: rdo rje dang mdung rtse gsum pa //
T02D2509:220a-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'khor 'jigs su rung
T02D2509:220a-6: ba mang po bsags nas sdigs ru'i tshul bstan te
T02D2509:220a-7: zhes gsungs pa / ma rnams kyi tshogs dang zhes
T02D2509:220a-8: bya ba de dag gis rang gi rdzu 'phrul dang
T02D2509:220a-9: mthu sna tshogs pa bstan pa rab tu 'thab cing

T02D2509:220a-15: mche ba cung zad phyungs te gtsigs pa'i chu'i rlabs
T02D2509:220a-16: dang 'dra ba'i khro gnyer byas pa mig phyir mi
T02D2509:220a-17: glon pa'i rdo rje'i blta ba mig gnyis pa zab
T02D2509:220a-18: mo'i don snying po la sogs rnam par grol ba'i
T02D2509:220a-19: tshig gis shigs pa bye brag phyed pa la sogs
T02D2509:220a-20: pa'o // snying po'i mchog ni h'um zhes bya ba
T02D2509:220a-21: nyid de phyag na rdo rje dang po'i sems dpa'i
T02D2509:220a-22: snying po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2509:220a-23: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya
T02D2509:220a-24: ba khams gsum gyi bgegs dang gnod par byed pa
T02D2509:220a-25: thams cad las rnam pa sna tshogs su rgyal bas
T02D2509:220a-27: h'um zhes bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje'i rang
T02D2509:220a-28: bzhin bstan pa ste ma rungs pa dang nyon mongs
T02D2509:220a-29: pa thams cad gtan 'pho bar byed pa'i don to
T02D2509:220a-30: // h'um zhes brjod pas dbang phyug chen po la
T02D2509:220a-31: sogs pa bred de bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su
T02D2509:220a-32: // song ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang lha
T02D2509:220a-33: rnams skyabs su gsol ba la cang ma gsung na
T02D2509:220a-34: ni sems can gyi don la btang snyoms su mdzad
T02D2509:220a-35: pas thugs rje dang mi ldan par 'gyur /
T02D2509:220a-36: de ltar ma byed cig ces phyag na rdo rje
T02D2509:220a-37: la zlog tu ni gdul bar bya ba thams cad
T02D2509:220a-38: mthar mi phyin pas bar mdo'i tshig tu khyod rab
T02D2509:220a-39: tu mi bsgrungs so zhes gsungs so //
T02D2509:220a-40: h'um zhes bya bas sdigs pa mgo glengs nas snying
T02D2509:220a-41: po 'dis lha chen po la sogs pa sma phab
T02D2509:220a-42: ste btul lo // snying po'i don ni gong du bshad par 'dus so //
T02D2509:220a-43: de bas na thul la dbugs phyung shig ces lha
T02D2509:220a-44: chen po la sogs pa de ltar btul ba ni
T02D2509:220a-45: legs kyis de ltar thul la thal byung du ma
T02D2509:220a-46: gsad par slar gsos shig ces pa'i don to //
T02D2509:220b-0: de dag gi don @220b gyi phyir rdo rje'i gzungs bcing ba 'di gsungs so //
T02D2509:220b-1: lha chen po la sogs pa de dag gso ba'i
T02D2509:220b-2: don gyi phyir phyag na rdo rje'i gzungs sngags thams
T02D2509:220b-3: cad du lus srog dang bral ba mi 'gyur bar
T02D2509:220b-5: aom ni rgyal po'i snying po'o //
T02D2509:220b-6: badzra dram dho me bha ba zhes bya ba ni bdag gi rdo rje bstan par gyur pa ste ;
T02D2509:220b-7: ye shes bstan pas thams cad srung //
T02D2509:220b-9: raksha sarba na zhes bya ba ni bskul ba ste thams cad srung ba'i don to //
T02D2509:220b-10: sv'a h'a ni legs par gsungs pa ste zhi ba'i don du sbyar ba'o //
T02D2509:220b-11: de ltar gsos nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D2509:220b-12: kyang lha chen po la sogs pa la phyag na
T02D2509:220b-13: rdo rje'i bka' nyon cig par bskul nas de dag
T02D2509:220b-14: gis kyang de ltar khas blangs te yang phyag na
T02D2509:220b-15: rdo rjes rang gi snying po bstan te de dag
T02D2509:220b-17: h'um ta ki ho 'di ni 'dod pa'i khro bo'i rang bzhin du ston te /
T02D2509:220b-18: h'um ni gtan 'pho bar byed pa'o //
T02D2509:220b-19: ta ki ni 'dod pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2509:220b-21: grogs po dag byang chub kyi sems kyis mas kyi
T02D2509:220b-22: sdom pa gzung bar khas long shig ces pa byang
T02D2509:220b-23: chub ni nyon mongs pa zad pa'i ye shes dang
T02D2509:220b-24: mi skye ba'i ye shes so //
T02D2509:220b-25: de la sems shing 'dod pa ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D2509:220b-26: de yang rnam pa lnga ste /
T02D2509:220b-32: de la rtsom pa ni dang po thos pa'i shes
T02D2509:220b-33: rab la gnas te byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir bdag
T02D2509:220b-34: bla na med pa'i byang chub tu gyur cig /
T02D2509:220b-35: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhes smon
T02D2509:220b-36: pa'o // rtsol ba ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa
T02D2509:220b-37: la gnas pas lung dang rigs pa la brten zhing
T02D2509:220b-38: bsam pa'i shes rab kyis chos dang gang zag la
T02D2509:220b-39: bdag med par mos pa ste /
T02D2509:220b-40: stong pa nyid du stsol ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2509:220b-41: 'jug pa ni chos bdag med pa la rang gis
T02D2509:220b-42: myong bar 'jug pa ste byang chub sems dpa'i sa
T02D2509:220b-43: dang po thob ces pa'i don to //
T02D2509:220b-44: gnas pa ni chos la bdag med pa'i don ci
T02D2509:220b-45: ltar rtogs pa de la mi g-yo bar rtse gcig
T02D2509:220b-46: tu gnas pa'o // ldang ba ni sems rtse gcig
T02D2509:220b-47: tu gnas pa las bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po
T02D2509:220b-48: tu gnas pa'o // bsgrub pa dang / sems can
T02D2509:220b-49: gyi don mang po bya ba'i phyir de las langs
T02D2509:220b-50: te spyod pa rgya chen po la 'jug pa'o //
T02D2509:221a-1: bu'i byang chub kyi sems gang yang rung ba mi

T02D2509:221a-3: kyi sdom pa'o // yang na byang chub kyi sems
T02D2509:221a-4: dang sdom pa so sor sbyar te byang chub kyi
T02D2509:221a-5: sems ni gong du smos pa lta bu ste de
T02D2509:221a-6: kyi sdom pa'o // gzung bar bya'o // sdom pa
T02D2509:221a-7: ni sngags kyi sdom pa ste rigs bzhi'i dam tshig
T02D2509:221a-9: byang chub kyi sems brtan par byas zhes bya ba
T02D2509:221a-10: la sogs pa ni lha la sogs pa dam 'cha'
T02D2509:221a-11: bar bzhug pa'i don brtan pa ste /

T02D2509:221a-13: brtan pa sra bar byas pa ni sems can thams

T02D2509:221a-16: de bas na byang chub kyi sems 'dod pa'i rang bzhin dang /
T02D2509:221a-17: phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid chen po mthu chen

T02D2509:221a-21: de nas dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug pa'i sngags gsungs so //
T02D2509:221a-22: de la aom ni don snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2509:221a-23: badzra sa ma ya aa bhi shi nytsa zhes bya

T02D2509:221a-25: bskur ba zhes bya ba'i don to //

T02D2509:221a-27: ba ni dam tshig gi rang bzhin bstan pa ste
T02D2509:221a-28: 'dod pa thams cad la ma skyo zhig ces bya
T02D2509:221a-29: ba'i don to // h'um phat ces bya ba ni

T02D2509:221a-31: ba'i don to // // 'di ni bdud kyis smras

T02D2509:221a-36: ba'i don to // // ste / sangs rgyas kyi
T02D2509:221a-37: byang chub ni 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid kyis
T02D2509:221a-38: 'thob bo zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pas
T02D2509:221a-39: na 'dod chags dang bral ba ni rigs kyi de

T02D2509:221a-43: 'dod pa la skyo bar ma byed cig ces bstan

T02D2509:221a-47: pa ste zhes pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni
T02D2509:221a-48: sems can ji lta bus 'dul ba de lta bu'i
T02D2509:221a-49: tshul du mdzad cing ston pa ste /
T02D2509:221b-0: 'dod chags kyi spyod pas 'dul ba la yang @221b 'dod chags kyi spyod pa ston te /
T02D2509:221b-1: khro bas 'dul ba'i spyod pa la yang khro ba'i spyod pa ston to //

T02D2509:221b-3: kyi tha mar na 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sun
T02D2509:221b-4: 'byin te chags pa'i dngos po mi rung bar yang
T02D2509:221b-6: lha la sogs pa so so'i skye bo rnams mya
T02D2509:221b-7: ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la ni mi chags
T02D2509:221b-8: par byed kyi / khams gsum na 'khor ba'i sdug
T02D2509:221b-9: bsngal ba la chags pa 'di dag la mya ngan
T02D2509:221b-10: las 'das pa'i bde ba la mi chags par ma
T02D2509:221b-12: de dag sbyang ba'i phyir zhes bya ba 'dod chags
T02D2509:221b-13: la sogs pa sgrib pa de dag sbyang ba'i phyir
T02D2509:221b-14: ro // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid kun du bzang po ste /
T02D2509:221b-15: phyag na rdo rje de sangs rgyas lnga rnams kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2509:221b-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar rigs pa'i gzhung bshad nas /
T02D2509:221b-17: de nas phyag na rdo rjes yang dam tshig 'dzin
T02D2509:221b-18: du gzhug pa'i sngags gong ma bzlas te gsungs so

T02D2509:221b-20: de'i sngags byin nas rdo rje dbang bskur bar bstan
T02D2509:221b-21: pa de nas yang phyag na rdo rje lag tu
T02D2509:221b-22: rdo rje byin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o
T02D2509:221b-23: // rdo rje dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje'i rigs
T02D2509:221b-24: su nges par bzhag pa'i 'dir[?] ras yang na rdo
T02D2509:221b-25: rje ni ye shes kyi mtshan ma ste /

T02D2509:221b-27: de la sngags kyi don ni 'di lta ste /
T02D2509:221b-28: aom ni rgyas pa'i snying po snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2509:221b-29: pa nas tve'i bar du ni de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2509:221b-30: thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'o zhes ye shes
T02D2509:221b-31: kyi mtshan ma rdo rje dbang bskur ba ste rdo
T02D2509:221b-32: rje 'dzin pa ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi sngags pa
T02D2509:221b-34: badzra p'a ni ni bod pa'i don //
T02D2509:221b-35: hr'i ni bsngags pa ste gzugs sna tshogs zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2509:221b-36: ha ni blta ba'i don to //

T02D2509:221b-38: de ltar rdo rjes dbang bskur nas sngon gyi bsnyems
T02D2509:221b-39: pa dang blta ba btang ste phyag na rdo rje'i
T02D2509:221b-40: dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas rang bzhin thams cad brje
T02D2509:221b-41: ba'i phyir ming yang brje dgos te /

T02D2509:222a-4: ming kun gyi glang la rdo rje smos pa ni
T02D2509:222a-5: phyag na rdo rjes btul la rdo rje'i rigs kyi

T02D2509:222a-13: kha cig ni rang bzhin dang las kyi sgo nas
T02D2509:222a-14: ming du btags pas bshad du yod pa rnams ni
T02D2509:222a-16: mthu bo che ni gtogs 'dod la bya ste sgyu ma sna tshogs pa ston pas na sgyu ma'o ;
T02D2509:222a-17: / tshangs pa ni thub pa'i rdo rje ste mi smra ba'o //
T02D2509:222a-18: mi smra ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2509:222a-19: sa nang gzhon nu ni lha chen po'i bu'o //
T02D2509:222a-20: dbang po ni lha ste sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bdag po'o //
T02D2509:222a-21: 'thab cha ni mtshon cha la sogs pa'o //
T02D2509:222a-22: 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang po zhes bya ba ni
T02D2509:222a-23: 'jig rten pa'i lha'i nang na gtso bo yin pa'i
T02D2509:222a-24: phyir ro // rig pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur ba
T02D2509:222a-25: ni phyi rol gyi rig pa rnams kyi gtso bor
T02D2509:222a-26: bskos pa ste rig pa ni nye bar bstan gyi
T02D2509:222a-27: phyir ro // / pha rol gyi sngags rnams kyi gtso bo yin no //
T02D2509:222a-28: yang na sngags kyang ma rig pa'i mun pa sel
T02D2509:222a-29: ba'i mthu yod pas rig par bshad de de'i gtso
T02D2509:222a-30: bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2509:222a-31: bar snang ni nyi zla rgyu ba'i phyogs kyi nam mkha'o //
T02D2509:222a-32: rdo rje 'khyil pa ni nyi ma'o //
T02D2509:222a-33: zla ba ni rdo rje 'od do //
T02D2509:222a-34: rdo rje be con ni gza' spen pa la bya'o //
T02D2509:222a-35: skye ba ling ni mig dmar la bya'o //
T02D2509:222a-36: de rnams ni phyi rol gyi khro bo'o //
T02D2509:222a-37: ma rungs pa thams cad thag 'dzud par dbang bskur ro //

T02D2509:222a-39: nam mkha' la rgyu ba ste chang gis myos pa
T02D2509:222a-40: la sogs pa bzhi ni bgegs kyi gtso bo ste
T02D2509:222a-41: / de dag ni phyag na rdo rje'i zham ring ba'i tshogs mang po'i gtso bor dbang bskur ro //

T02D2509:222b-4: sgo 'dir smras pa thams cad dgos pa de bzhin
T02D2509:222b-5: du chos kyi rgyal ba chen po rnam par snang
T02D2509:222b-6: mdzad dang / phyag na rdo rje'i 'khor thams cad kyang tshul de lta bur blta'o //
T02D2509:222b-7: de nas lha chen po la sogs pa btsun mo rnams kyang ming gi dbang bskur te /
T02D2509:222b-8: las so sor bskos pa de nas 'jig rten gsum
T02D2509:222b-9: gyi bdag po lha chen po zhes bya ba la
T02D2509:222b-10: sogs pa'o // nyon mongs ma ni lha chen po'i
T02D2509:222b-11: btsun mo ste de bzhin du lha so so'i btsun
T02D2509:222b-12: mor rim bzhin du sbyar ro //
T02D2509:222b-13: de bzhin du sa 'og ma rnams kyi bar du
T02D2509:222b-14: btsun mo'i rim bzhin du btsun mo rnams kyang de
T02D2509:222b-15: dag gi btsun mo yin par rig par bya'o //
T02D2509:222b-16: de nas phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2509:222b-17: chen po de dag thams cad btsud de sangs rgyas
T02D2509:222b-18: kyi ye shes bskyed nas rdo rje dam tshig sbyin
T02D2509:222b-19: pa zhes bya ba slob ma de dag thams cad
T02D2509:222b-20: dkyil 'khor du btsud nas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
T02D2509:222b-21: mi gnyis pa'i don bstan te /
T02D2509:222b-22: rtog pa dang mos pa ci ltar bskyed nas so so rang gi dam tshig gi sngags brjod do //
T02D2509:222b-23: dam tshig gi sngags sa 'og ma'i sa yan chad kun kyang spyi'i don du 'dra ste /
T02D2509:222b-24: dgug pa dang mchod pa dang byin gyis brlab pa
T02D2509:222b-25: la sogs pa'i las byed pa'i tshe dam tshig gi
T02D2509:222b-27: de la rig pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi sngags 'di /
T02D2509:222b-28: aom ba li to zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2509:222b-29: de la aom gyi don ni rgyas pa'i snying po ste snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2509:222b-30: ba li to ba le ta zhes bya ba ni
T02D2509:222b-31: de dag gi rang bzhin bstan pa ste gcu zhing
T02D2509:222b-33: badzra ka ri sha dang dzva /
T02D2509:222b-34: zhes bya ba ni las bstan pa te dgug pa'o //
T02D2509:222b-35: lha rnams dgug pa'o zhes bya ba ni rig pa
T02D2509:222b-36: dam pa la sogs pa lha rnams dgug pa la
T02D2509:222b-38: bar snang ba'i sngags ni h'um //
T02D2509:222b-39: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2509:222b-40: h'um ni gtan 'pho ba ste gdug pa thams cad sel ba'i don to //
T02D2509:222b-41: ba nas yam gi bar du rdo rje mchog gi dam tshig gis gzir ba ste /
T02D2509:223a-1: las mi 'da' zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2509:223a-2: h'um zhes bya ba ni byos shig par bsgom pa'o //
T02D2509:223a-3: nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i sngags ni aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2509:223a-4: de ni rdo rje phreng ba'i mchog bcings pa'o zhes rang bzhin gyi don bstan pa'o //
T02D2509:223a-5: sa la rgyu ba ni lha rnams to //
T02D2509:223a-6: aom badzra bhandha ham zhes bya ba ni rgyas pa'i
T02D2509:223a-7: snying po dang bcas pa rdo rje bcings pa ltos
T02D2509:223a-9: sa 'og ma pa rnams kyi sngags ni /
T02D2509:223a-10: aom badzra pa ta la zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2509:223a-11: pa ste badzra pa ta la ni sa 'og ma
T02D2509:223a-12: pa ste rang bzhin bstan pa'o //
T02D2509:223a-13: banydza dang h'um phat kyis ni las bstan pa ste ma rungs pa'i phyogs gzhom pa dang /
T02D2509:223a-14: gtan 'pho bar gyis shig pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2509:223a-15: rig pa'i rgyal mo man chad nas sa 'og ma
T02D2509:223a-16: yan chad bud med kyi dam tshig gi sngags ni
T02D2509:223a-17: / aom he ru ka la sogs pa'o //
T02D2509:223a-18: he ru ka badzra sa ma ya zhes bya ba
T02D2509:223a-19: ni rang bzhin bstan pa ste khro bo rdo rje
T02D2509:223a-20: dam tshig ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2509:223a-21: de yan chad kyis ni las bstan pa ste ma
T02D2509:223a-22: rungs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang phyag rgya
T02D2509:223a-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes
T02D2509:223a-25: bdag gis sems can 'dul ba'i sug las bgyis pa
T02D2509:223a-26: ni gong du smos pa lta bu ni gzhan yang
T02D2509:223a-27: ma rungs pa mi srun pa'am byad ma dang rims
T02D2509:223a-28: dang ngan song gi rnams ji ltar bgyi zhes zhus
T02D2509:223a-29: pa / bcom ldan 'das bdag dang sems can 'dul ba ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2509:223a-30: dam tshig de nyid la nan tan byed du chug
T02D2509:223a-31: cig ces bya ba ni gong du 'dod pa mi
T02D2509:223a-32: spong ngo zhes bstan pa'i dam tshig de la nan
T02D2509:223a-33: tan du byed du chug cig / spyir na dkyil
T02D2509:223a-35: rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D2509:223a-36: sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa ji ltar bzhugs pa
T02D2509:223a-37: mngon du mthong ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gong du bshad
T02D2509:223a-38: pa rnams so // da ni mi la sogs pa
T02D2509:223a-39: rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan ni ri
T02D2509:223a-40: mor bris te bstan par bya ba'i phyir phyag na
T02D2509:223a-41: rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la mi de dag ji
T02D2509:223a-42: ltar nan tan bgyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o
T02D2509:223a-43: pa rnams so // // de ltar lha rnams kyi
T02D2509:223b-0: lus kyi gsang ba @223b bstan pa dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2509:223b-1: pa rnams so // // po'o // ngag gi gsang
T02D2509:223b-2: ba bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2509:223b-3: pa rnams so // // po'o // ro // sems
T02D2509:223b-4: kyi gsang ba bstan pa ni dam tshig gi dkyil
T02D2509:223b-6: ro // spyod pa sna tshogs kyi gsang ba bstan
T02D2509:223b-7: pa ni las kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2509:223b-8: de ltar na lha rnams kyi lus dang ngag dang
T02D2509:223b-9: yid dang spyod pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs
T02D2509:223b-10: pa'i sngags pas sngags kyi don rnams bsgrub par bya'o
T02D2509:223b-11: // dkyil 'khor gcig gi nang du bzhi char 'dus par yang bstan te /
T02D2509:223b-12: gang na gson po'i lus yod pa da na sems dang yi ge'i 'bru'i tshig rnams kyang yod la /
T02D2509:223b-13: de dag gi spyod pa las kyi rang bzhin yang yod par 'gyur ro //
T02D2509:223b-14: de lta mod kyi gang gis shas che ba gtso
T02D2509:223b-15: bor byas pa'i phyir na dkyil 'khor bzhir yang brjod
T02D2509:223b-16: do // dkyil 'khor du rim par bzhugs pa ni
T02D2509:223b-17: sems can gyis blta sla ba'i phyir sbom rims su
T02D2509:223b-18: do // gzud de / dang po lus kyi gsang
T02D2509:223b-19: ba kha dog dang dbyibs su snang ba chud sla
T02D2509:223b-20: bas na thog mar smos so //
T02D2509:223b-21: de'i 'og tu ngag gi gsang ba yi ge'i 'bru
T02D2509:223b-22: dang sgrar brjod par dmigs pas sla bas na ngag
T02D2509:223b-24: sems kyi gsang ba rnam par thar pa'i sgo mang
T02D2509:223b-25: po chud par dka' bas na de'i 'og tu smos
T02D2509:223b-26: so // dkyil 'khor de gsum char du zhugs nas
T02D2509:223b-27: sems can gyi don la sogs pa spyod pa sna
T02D2509:223b-28: tshogs nus par gyur pas na las ni tha mar
T02D2509:223b-29: so // bshad do // de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2509:223b-30: cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen por btsud nas zhes bya
T02D2509:223b-31: ba de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2509:223b-32: te lus kyi gsang ba bstan pa ni de bzhin
T02D2509:223b-33: gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor yin pa'i phyir ro
T02D2509:223b-34: so // bshad do // // rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2509:223b-35: du tshud cig ces bya ba 'di'i skabs su rdo
T02D2509:223b-36: rje 'di dag gis bsang ba bya ste /
T02D2509:223b-37: 'dis dngos po yod par lta ba thams cad rig
T02D2509:223b-38: pa'i tshig gis 'jig cing 'joms pa'i phyir te padmo'i
T02D2509:223b-39: rigs chos kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i tha tshig
T02D2509:223b-40: go // dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du tshud cig
T02D2509:223b-41: ces pa so so'i rnam par thar pa'i mtshan ma
T02D2509:224a-1: sems kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2509:224a-2: de'ang dkyil 'khor der zhugs pas dam tshig thob pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2509:224a-3: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ste rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2509:224a-4: las kyi dkyil 'khor du tshud cig ces pa /
T02D2509:224a-5: dkyil 'khor gong ma dag tu zhugs nas las sna
T02D2509:224a-6: tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir yang las kyi dkyil 'khor du
T02D2509:224a-7: 'jug go / de nas dkyil 'khor bzhi'i mtshan nyid
T02D2509:224a-8: ci 'dra ba bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs
T02D2509:224a-9: kyis phyag na rdo rjes 'chad de /
T02D2509:224a-11: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul bshad pa //
T02D2509:224a-12: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2509:224a-14: dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba grub pa rab
T02D2509:224a-15: 'bring tha ma thams cad ster bar byed pa'i mchog
T02D2509:224a-17: sngags pa dam tshig can du ma gyur gyi bar
T02D2509:224a-18: du sngags sgrub pa'i thabs med do bshad pa de
T02D2509:224a-19: 'ang phyag na rdo rje rang gi mthu 'ba' zhig
T02D2509:224a-20: ma yin te / dkyil 'khor pa'i sangs rgyas lnga thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs te bshad do //
T02D2509:224a-22: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2509:224a-23: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa //
T02D2509:224a-24: zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga zhib tu bshad ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2509:224a-25: rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D2509:224a-26: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa ri rab ri'i
T02D2509:224a-27: rtse mo na bzhugs te sems can gyi don mdzad
T02D2509:224a-28: pa de bzhin du gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor yang
T02D2509:224a-29: ri rab ri'i tshul du 'dra bar bstan te /
T02D2509:224a-30: dbus su chos kyi 'khor lo dang 'dra bar rtsib ma can zlum por bris te /
T02D2509:224a-31: de'i dbus kyi snying po la bcom ldan 'das rnam
T02D2509:224a-32: par snang mdzad sku mdog gser gyi mdog zhal shar
T02D2509:224a-33: phyogs su gzigs pa la gdan du nas bting ba
T02D2509:224a-35: rnam par snang mdzad nyid las rnams bzhi'i nang na rgyas pa'i phrin las gtsor mdzad pas na /
T02D2509:224a-36: de dang rjes su mthun par rgyas pa'i zhal zas nas gdan du bting ngo //
T02D2509:224a-37: bcom ldan 'das de'i 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' brgyad bri ba ni 'di lta ste /
T02D2509:224a-38: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas phyogs su ni spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang /
T02D2509:224b-1: sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o //
T02D2509:224b-2: g-yon phyogs su ni rdo rje khu tshur dang byams pa dang nam mkha' mdzod do //
T02D2509:224b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyab phyogs su ni nam mkha'i snying po'o //
T02D2509:224b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og gi spyan sngar ni phyag
T02D2509:224b-5: na rdo rje ste rdo rje h'um ka ra'i gzugs
T02D2509:224b-6: su gzhag go // da rnams kun gyi gnas kyang
T02D2509:224b-7: 'khor lo'i rtsi ba ma re re sa bar du
T02D2509:224b-8: su gzhag go // gcad do // de zlum por
T02D2509:224b-9: bya ba yang ras kyi skud pa dkar po sar
T02D2509:224b-10: pa ring cha mnyam pa ha cang phra sbom du
T02D2509:224b-11: ma gyur pa'i mtshan ma bkal legs pa bzang po
T02D2509:224b-12: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su seng ldeng gi phur bu
T02D2509:224b-13: btab la gnyis rim du btags pas dkyil 'khor zlum
T02D2509:224b-14: po ma 'khrul bar sa gcad do //
T02D2509:224b-15: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi las byed pa'i tshe /
T02D2509:224b-16: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba ste rdo
T02D2509:224b-17: rje h'um ka ra nyid kyi rnal 'byor du bdag
T02D2509:224b-18: rang byas te / de'i snying po'i sngags kyang yid la bya zhing /
T02D2509:224b-19: der srung ba dang byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2509:224b-20: dbus kyi phur bu la srad bus btags te cha
T02D2509:224b-21: bcu drug tu bgo ba ni cha mnyam bcu drug
T02D2509:224b-22: tu bgo bar nges pa med de //
T02D2509:224b-23: spyir grangs bcu drug tu bgo ba ni nang gi 'khor lo la gcig gser gyi ri bdun dang /
T02D2509:224b-24: chu rim bdun la cha bcu bzhi //
T02D2509:224b-25: gling bzhi gnas pa'i snam bu la cha gcig ste cha bcu drug tu bya'o //
T02D2509:224b-26: bcu drug gi phyi rol du ri'i 'khor yug chen po tshon sna gsum dang ldan pas bris te /
T02D2509:224b-27: de yi phyogs bzhir sgo gdod do //
T02D2509:224b-29: zhes bya ba ni zlum po rtsib ma brgyad du bya ste /
T02D2509:224b-30: rtsib ma'i bar du byang chub sems dpa' re re bzhugs par bya'o //
T02D2509:224b-31: dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bur bre //
T02D2509:224b-32: zhes pa dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs thams cad du srad bus ma 'grub par bre ba'i don to //
T02D2509:224b-33: seng ldeng gi phur bu gtan par ro //
T02D2509:224b-34: zhes pa phur bu gzhan gyis mi bya bar seng
T02D2509:224b-35: ldeng gis bya ba ni bgegs thams cad seng ldeng
T02D2509:224b-36: gi phur bus gnan pa dang phur bu des thig
T02D2509:224b-37: gtab pa'i gzungs su dgos te /
T02D2509:224b-38: gtan pa dang mi 'khrul par gdab ces pa'i don to //
T02D2509:225a-0: thams cad du ni rim gsum mchog / ces pa ni phyi rol gyi khor khor yug @225a * //
T02D2509:225a-1: gis phyogs thams cad du bskor te /
T02D2509:225a-2: tshon rtsi mdzes par rim gsum gyis bya ba la
T02D2509:225a-3: phyi rol gyi tha ma ni sngon pos bskor te
T02D2509:225a-4: lcags kyi ri 'dra bar brtag go //
T02D2509:225a-5: phur bu yis ni de bzhin no //
T02D2509:225a-6: zhes bya ba phyi rol gyi 'khor yug de yang dbus kyi phur bu de la thag btags nas /
T02D2509:225a-7: mnyam par bskor zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2509:225a-8: de yi nang du bya ba ni //
T02D2509:225a-9: zhes pa ri'i khor yug de'i nang gser gyi ri rim bdun tshon ser po dri zhim pos bri'o //
T02D2509:225a-10: tshon sna lnga mchog rnams kyis so //
T02D2509:225a-11: zhes pa 'khor lo'i mu khyud la sogs pa'i ri mo tshon phye ma sna lngas bri ba dang /
T02D2509:225a-12: rigs lnga'i lha rnams ci rigs par kha dog lngar bya ba'i don to //
T02D2509:225a-14: zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar shar phyogs su phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs lugs ma'am /
T02D2509:225a-15: 'jim pa'am shing las byas pa'am ri mor bris pa bzhag pa'o //
T02D2509:225a-16: phyag na rdo rje yang sems can gyi don du
T02D2509:225a-17: gzugs sna tshogs par 'phrul na 'dir ci 'dra ba
T02D2509:225a-18: zhig ba zhag cen gsungs pa /
T02D2509:225a-20: phyag na rdo rje'i rang bzhin rdo rje h'um ka
T02D2509:225a-21: ra'i rang bzhin du 'dus pa de bzhugs par byas
T02D2509:225a-22: te / de'i cha lugs kyang phyag bzhi pa la gnyis ni h'um ka ra'i phyag rgya bcings pa'o//
T02D2509:225a-23: gnyis ni mda' gzhu bsnams pa'o //
T02D2509:225a-24: zhabs g-yas g-yon gyis lha chen po spang shugs mnan pa'o //
T02D2509:225a-25: 'dod drug gcod pa'i lha rnams dag /'dod pa'i khams
T02D2509:225a-26: kyi lha chen po bzhi dang sum cu rtsa gsum
T02D2509:225a-27: dang 'thab bral dang dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga' dang
T02D2509:225a-28: / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams gser gyi ri bdun dang /
T02D2509:225a-29: nang gi ri rab bar 'khor lo'i phyi rol ri rab kyi zhol la gzhag par bya ste /
T02D2509:225a-30: phyogs bzhir ni mgon po 'phags skyes po dang /
T02D2509:225a-31: ngal bso bo la sogs pa ci rigs par bzhag de'i bar du lha lhag ma rnams gzhag go //
T02D2509:225a-32: de nas dkyil 'khor byin te phyir byung ba dang nang du 'jug pa'i tshe /
T02D2509:225a-33: ri mo dang phyag rgya la sogs pa la rdo
T02D2509:225a-34: rje shugs kyi sbyor ba ma byas par 'gongs na
T02D2509:225a-35: dam tshig nyams par 'gyur gyi yid kyis ri mo
T02D2509:225a-36: la sogs pa bteg la 'og tu 'dzul bar bsams
T02D2509:225a-37: te rdo rje shugs kyi sngags kyis shig / grva'i
T02D2509:225b-1: / ces pa gling so so'i grva yod pa rnams zur phyin par bya'o //
T02D2509:225b-2: gling de dag gi nang du yang bcud kyi 'jig
T02D2509:225b-3: rten so so na ji ltar gnas pa'i cha lugs
T02D2509:225b-4: bzhin du bsog cing bri bar bya'o //
T02D2509:225b-5: tshangs pa la sogs pa bzhi'i rnams zhes pa gling
T02D2509:225b-6: der tshangs pa dang lha chen po dang dbang po
T02D2509:225b-8: shar phyogs kyi gling gi dbus su dbang po btsun mo dang bcas par bri'o //
T02D2509:225b-9: de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling du lha chen po'o //
T02D2509:225b-10: nub kyi ba glang spyod kyi gling du tshangs pa /
T02D2509:225b-11: byang gi sgra mi snyan du rtogs 'dod btsun mo dang bcas su bri'o //
T02D2509:225b-12: phyi'i rdo rje rigs rnams kyi //
T02D2509:225b-13: dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya //
T02D2509:225b-14: zhes pa ri khor yug gi nang logs gling rnams
T02D2509:225b-15: kyi bar dag tu smos pa'i bar snang la rgyu
T02D2509:225b-16: ba'i nam mkha' la rgyu ba dang sa pa dang
T02D2509:225b-17: / sa 'og pa thams cad spang shugs nye bar gzhag cing dkyil 'khor du dgod par bya'o //
T02D2509:225b-18: sgo srung bri bar bya ba yang //
T02D2509:225b-19: zhes pa ri khor yug gi phyi rol sgo bzhi btod de shar phyogs su kyo ba dang /
T02D2509:225b-20: lho phyogs su zhags pa dang /
T02D2509:225b-21: nub phyogs su lcags sgrog byang phyogs su dril bu'o //
T02D2509:225b-22: khor yug gi phyi rol du sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i gzugs bzhag gam /
T02D2509:225b-23: ri mor bri'am so so'i sar thig le bzhag ste de'i mtshan mar bsngos pa gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2509:225b-24: chos min can ni bzhag phyir ro //
T02D2509:225b-25: zhes pa yi dags dang nad la sogs pa dkyil
T02D2509:225b-26: 'khor gyi phyi rol 'dab tu gzhag pa ni dkon
T02D2509:225b-27: mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa dang /
T02D2509:225b-28: sems can mang po la gnod pa byed pa rnams

T02D2509:229a-10: pa'i cho ga gzhung gzhan las 'byung ba rim bzhin

T02D2509:229a-12: zhing brgya stong bzlas pa ni dus gnyis sam dus
T02D2509:229a-14: spyir brgyad stong gnyis 'bum bzlas par bgyi'o //
T02D2509:229a-15: zas gtsang ma yid bzhin du zos te zhes bya
T02D2509:229a-16: ba gtsang ma ni sha dang chang dang sgog btsong
T02D2509:229a-17: la sogs pas sbags pa bza' bar mi rigs pas
T02D2509:229a-18: spang bar bya'o // yid bzhin du zos zhes bya
T02D2509:229a-19: ba ni gtsang ma'i nang na gang 'dod pa zos
T02D2509:229a-21: bzlas pa'i sngags ni gong du smos pa'i aom sumbha ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2509:229a-22: phyi rol las rnams 'grub bya ba //
T02D2509:229a-23: zhes bya ba nor btsal ba dang gdon bskrad pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2509:229a-24: h'um zhes bya ba gnyis kyis ni las thams cad
T02D2509:229a-25: 'grub bar 'gyur ro zhes pa h'um ka ra'i phyag
T02D2509:229a-26: rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor byas la cho ga gong
T02D2509:229a-27: ma bzhin du zla ba gnyis bzlas na rgyas pa
T02D2509:229a-28: dang dbang du bya ba la sogs pa'i las 'grub
T02D2509:229a-29: po / zla ba lngas ni yid bzhin du snang
T02D2509:229a-30: ba dang mi snang bar 'gyur ba'o zhes snang bar
T02D2509:229a-32: zla ba brgyad kyis zhes pa cho ga gong ma
T02D2509:229a-33: bzhin du zla ba brgyad bzlas na lha dang mi
T02D2509:229a-34: la sogs par rang gi gnas nas gar dgos par
T02D2509:229a-35: dgug pa dang / bkug nas dkyil 'khor la sogs
T02D2509:229a-36: pa gar dgos par gnas su bzhugs pa dang gnas
T02D2509:229a-37: su bcug nas dam tshig la sogs pas rang dbang
T02D2509:229a-38: du mi gtong bar bcing ba dang bcings nas bdag
T02D2509:229a-39: gi dbang du 'gyur te las bya'o //
T02D2509:229a-41: zla ba bcu gcig gis ni sa bcu gcig pa
T02D2509:229a-42: sangs rgyas kyi sa 'thob po zhes pa kun du
T02D2509:229a-43: sangs rgyas pa'i sa gzugs kyi sku 'thob po //
T02D2509:229b-0: zla ba bcu gnyis kyis @229b ni rdo rje 'dzin
T02D2509:229b-1: par 'gyur zhes bya ba rdo rje sems dpa' nyid
T02D2509:229b-2: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rnam par
T02D2509:229b-3: snang mdzad chen po'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na
T02D2509:229b-4: kun du sangs rgyas pa'i sa pas gong du bshad
T02D2509:229b-5: do // yang gcig tu sems dpa' thams cad kyi
T02D2509:229b-6: dang po nyid rdo rje sems dpa' yin pas kun
T02D2509:229b-7: gyi mchog tu yang bshad do //
T02D2509:229b-8: de nas sgrub pa gzhan te zhes pa gong du
T02D2509:229b-9: smos pa lta bu'i ras la dbus su rdo rje
T02D2509:229b-10: h'um ka ra gong du smos pa lta bu bris
T02D2509:229b-11: la de'i thad kor du lha chen po la sogs
T02D2509:229b-12: pa rig pa'i rgyal po rnams dang bar snang la
T02D2509:229b-13: spyod pa'i nyi ma la sogs pa dang ;
T02D2509:229b-14: nam mkha' la spyod pa dang sa 'og ma'i lha rnams kyis bskor ba bris la /
T02D2509:229b-15: de nas de'i spyan sngar bzlas pa'i cho ga rdzogs
T02D2509:229b-16: par byas la bdag rang h'um ka ra'i phyag rgya
T02D2509:229b-17: chen po'i rnal 'byor du gnas nas ci nus pa
T02D2509:229b-18: grangs med par bzlas te zla ba gcig lon nas
T02D2509:229b-19: tshes nyi shu dgu'i mtshan mo mchod pa khyad par
T02D2509:229b-20: du rdzogs par byas nas bsgrub po /
T02D2509:229b-21: de nas sgrub pa gzhan 'byung ste //
T02D2509:229b-22: zhes pa ras la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um
T02D2509:229b-23: ka ra de bzhin du dbus su bris nas mtha'
T02D2509:229b-24: ma khor khor yug tu lha chen po la sogs
T02D2509:229b-25: pa'i btsun mo gser mdangs la sogs pa lha mo
T02D2509:229b-26: rnams nas klu'i chung ma'i bar du thams cad kyi
T02D2509:229b-27: gzugs bris la / rang rang gi phyag rgya 'khor
T02D2509:229b-28: lo dang rdo rje la sogs pa lag na thogs
T02D2509:229b-29: shing phyag rgya mngon du phyungs te mi sdug pa'i
T02D2509:229b-30: gzugs bris la / gzugs bri'o // 'di ni rtog
T02D2509:229b-31: pa 'dir bris pa bzhin no zhes pa 'di lta
T02D2509:229b-32: bu'i 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs 'di ni rtog pa
T02D2509:229b-33: las kyang 'di lta bu'i 'jigs pa yod do zhes
T02D2509:229b-34: 'byung bar snga nas zhes pa na 'dis ni mi
T02D2509:229b-36: de nas cho ga gzhan te ras la bcom ldan
T02D2509:229b-37: 'das de bzhin du bris la zhes pa gong du
T02D2509:229b-38: smos pa lta bu la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
T02D2509:229b-39: h'um ka ra phyag bzhi pa bris te nyin re
T02D2509:229b-40: zhing brgya stong du bzlas na zla ba bcu gnyis
T02D2509:229b-41: lon pa'i nub mo tha ma la rdo rje 'dzin
T02D2509:229b-43: gzhan yang bsgrub par bya ba phyag na rdo rje'i
T02D2509:229b-44: spyan sngar 'bum zlos shig de ltar bsnyen pa byas
T02D2509:230a-0: nas zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sogs @230a *
T02D2509:230a-1: // ba kun phyag na rdo rjes mdzad de //
T02D2509:230a-2: ci 'dod par yam shing thams cad kyis zhes bzhi
T02D2509:230a-3: pa dang rgyas pa'i yam shing gang yang rung ba
T02D2509:230a-4: sngags la ci 'dod pa las bsreg go //
T02D2509:230a-5: de nas rdo rje h'um zhes bris la zhes pa
T02D2509:230a-6: rdo rje h'um ka ra las gong ma bzhin du
T02D2509:230a-7: bris la de'i spyan sngar lo gcig gi bar du
T02D2509:230a-8: ci nus grangs nges pa med par mang du zlos
T02D2509:230a-9: shig / de nas nub gcig smyung ste mtshan thal
T02D2509:230a-10: byung bsgrubs na grub pa mchog la sogs pa rdo
T02D2509:230a-11: rje h'um ka ra nyid kyis stsol bar 'gyur ro
T02D2509:230a-12: // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar
T02D2509:230a-13: rdo rje h'um zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings la zhes
T02D2509:230a-14: pa rnam par snang mdzad ri mor bris pa'i spyan
T02D2509:230a-15: sngar rdo rje h'um kara'i phyag rgya chen po'i rnal
T02D2509:230a-17: de nyid kyi lag pa'i phyag rgya yang bcings nas bzlas so //
T02D2509:230a-18: rig pas dbang bskur bar bya bar 'dod na zhes
T02D2509:230a-19: pa rig pa ni sngags kyi lha rnams la bya'o
T02D2509:230a-20: // aom sumbha zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i snying
T02D2509:230a-21: po gong du smos pas mar la bsngags shing gzugs
T02D2509:230a-22: kyi spyi po nas blugs shing dbang bskur ba byas
T02D2509:230a-23: na de'i rgyu mthun pa'i las kyi 'bras bu phyi
T02D2509:230a-24: nang gi sngags kyi lha thams cad kyi bdag por
T02D2509:230a-25: 'gyur te phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra ba 'thob
T02D2509:230a-26: // bo // phyag gnyis brkyang ste rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D2509:230a-27: zhes pa rdo rje h'um ka ra'i sku gzugs phyag
T02D2509:230a-28: bzhi pa gong ma bzhin las phyag gnyis na rdo
T02D2509:230a-30: phyag thad kar gyen du bsgreng ba'o //
T02D2509:230a-31: de bzhin du phyag brkyang ba zhes pa rdo rje
T02D2509:230a-32: h'um ka ra'i phyag gyen du brkyang ba bzhin du
T02D2509:230a-33: rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag kyang gyen du brkyang
T02D2509:230a-35: gzugs de zhigs kyi bar du snying po gong du smos pa bzlas shing bkru'o //
T02D2509:230a-36: yid bzhin du zhes bya ba ni nam 'dod pa
T02D2509:230a-37: na mi snang bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig
T02D2509:230a-38: go // g-yas par rdo rje h'um zhes pa rdo
T02D2509:230a-39: rje h'um ka ra'i phyag rgya rdo rje khu tshur
T02D2509:230a-40: bcings la mdzub mo bsgreng pa snying gar gzhag pa'o
T02D2509:230a-41: go // // thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro
T02D2509:230a-42: zhes bya ba mtho ris dang nam mkha' dang rtsig
T02D2509:230a-43: pa dang ri la sogs par thogs pa med par
T02D2509:230a-45: grub pa 'og nas 'byung ba kun kyang don de
T02D2509:230b-1: 'khor mthong bar dus gsum du khrus byas zhes pa
T02D2509:230b-2: dkyil 'khor gong du smos pa rnams su cho ga
T02D2509:230b-3: bzhin du zhugs nas dam tshig can du gyur pa'o
T02D2509:230b-5: rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya ni gong du smos pa
T02D2509:230b-7: do // rno lcags kyi mtshon chas der rdo rje
T02D2509:230b-8: bris la zhes pa lci ba'i dkyil 'khor de la
T02D2509:230b-9: rdo rje rtse lnga pa bri'o //
T02D2509:230b-10: bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo zhes pa ni phyag na rdo rje nyid mngon du gshegs te mthong ba'o //
T02D2509:230b-11: rdo rje ras sam rtsig pa'am //
T02D2509:230b-12: zhes pa rdo rje rtse lnga pa ri mor bris
T02D2509:230b-13: la de la mchod pa rnam ba lnga pos ci
T02D2509:230b-15: gzung du bde ba na rdo rje khu tshur gyis gzung ngo //
T02D2509:230b-16: gzung du mi bde na yang rdo rje khu tshur gyis gzung ba lta bur rig par bya'o //
T02D2509:230b-17: bde ba yang yid bde ba thams cad thob par
T02D2509:230b-18: 'gyur ro zhes bya ba bde ba ni lus kyi
T02D2509:230b-19: bde ba'o // yid bde ba ni sems kyi bde ba'o //
T02D2509:230b-20: rdo rje khu tshur gyis ral gri bzung la zhes
T02D2509:230b-21: pa lo gcig gi bar du dus gsum du snying
T02D2509:230b-22: po gong du smos pa ci nus par bzlas la
T02D2509:230b-23: lo gcig lon nas mtshan thal byung bzlas te bsgrubs
T02D2509:230b-24: na rig 'dzin gyi rgyal por 'gyur ro //
T02D2509:230b-25: rig 'dzin ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha nam mkha'
T02D2509:230b-26: la rgyu zhing bde ba'i longs spyod dang ldan pa
T02D2509:230b-27: ste / rang gi las kyi rnam par smin pas
T02D2509:230b-28: der skyes pa dang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las
T02D2509:230b-29: 'das pa'i sngags grub pas skyes pa ste /
T02D2509:230b-30: de dag gi bdag po ni rig 'dzin gyi rgyal po yin no //
T02D2509:230b-31: 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bris la zhes pa dkyil 'khor 'khor lo lta bur zlum por bris te /
T02D2509:230b-32: phyag na rdo rje dbus su bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar
T02D2509:230b-33: lcags kyi 'khor lo lag tu thogs nas mtshan thal
T02D2509:230b-34: byung bsgrub bo / 'di yang sngar bsnyen pa ni
T02D2509:230b-35: cho ga bzhin du byas nas gdong bsgrub par bya'o
T02D2509:230b-36: byung bsgrub bo / // de nas kyo ba tang
T02D2509:230b-37: sgrub par 'dod pas zhes pa sngar bsnyen pa'i mtshan
T02D2509:230b-38: ma'am grangs sam dus kyis rdzogs par byas nas phyag
T02D2509:230b-39: na rdo rje ri mor bris pa'i spyan sngar bsgrub
T02D2509:230b-40: byung bsgrub bo / // bo // de nas lha
T02D2509:230b-41: la sogs pa dgug pa 'byung ste zhes pa lha
T02D2509:230b-42: chen po la sogs pa rig pa'i rgyal po dang
T02D2509:230b-43: bar snang la sogs pa'i nam mkha' la spyod pa
T02D2509:230b-44: gong du smos pa gang yang rung ba'o//
T02D2509:231a-0: @231a * // de nas ma rnams thams cad dbang du bya bar
T02D2509:231a-1: 'dod pas zhes pa lha chen po la sogs pa'i
T02D2509:231a-2: chung ma'i gzugs byas te snying gar rdog pas mnan
T02D2509:231a-3: la bzlas so // de yang sngar bsnyen pa bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no //
T02D2509:231a-4: tshogs kyi bdag por bcug cing de dag gis mchod
T02D2509:231a-5: de zhes bya ba ni lha chen po'i 'khor tshogs
T02D2509:231a-6: mang po'i bdag por bcug ste 'khor de dag gis
T02D2509:231a-7: sngags pa de la mchod par byed do //
T02D2509:231a-8: sngon ma byung ba'i don ni mi la med pa'i mtho ris kyi rdzas la sogs pa'o //
T02D2509:231a-9: 'di lta bu'i rnal 'byor yang gter zhes bya ba'i
T02D2509:231a-10: ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par bsgoms pas khro bo
T02D2509:231a-11: zhes bya ba lha chen po'i gnas su yang des
T02D2509:231a-13: de la sus cung zad kyang byed du mi nus
T02D2509:231a-14: so zhes pa lha dang mi la sogs pa sus
T02D2509:231a-15: kyang gnod pa byed mi nus so zhes pa'i don
T02D2509:231a-16: to // phyag na rdo rje las lha mo'i lus
T02D2509:231a-17: mthong gi bar du ste zhes pa phyag na rdo
T02D2509:231a-18: rje'i sku la lha mo shin tu mdzes pa'i lus
T02D2509:231a-20: de 'byung ba mthong na lha mo de la gud du ma 'gro ma 'gul cig ces bsgo'o //
T02D2509:231a-21: de ltar grub pas na bya ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2509:231a-22: de nas mtsho dbyangs ma dbang du bya bar 'dod
T02D2509:231a-23: na zhes pa mtsho dbyangs ma ni 'jig rten pa'i
T02D2509:231a-24: ngag la dbang thob par 'gyur ba'i lha ste de
T02D2509:231a-25: sgrub pa yang rdo rje h'um ka ra ri mor
T02D2509:231a-27: aom sumbha ni sumbha zhes bya ba'i snying po gong
T02D2509:231a-28: du smos pa'i yi ge de phreng bar byas la
T02D2509:231a-29: 'brum bu re re zhing gcig bzhag gcig bklags te
T02D2509:231a-30: nyin re zhing dus gsum du dus gcig kyang brgya
T02D2509:231a-31: stong bzlas so// yi ge bsnor cing bklag pa ni
T02D2509:231a-32: tshig la dbang thob par bya ba'i don du ste
T02D2509:231a-33: mtsho dbyangs ma tshig la dbang du gyur pa'i lha
T02D2509:231a-34: yin pa'i phyir de dang rjes su mthun par bsgrub
T02D2509:231a-35: stong bzlas so// po / sro ta aa dza na
T02D2509:231a-36: blangs la 'joms pa'i steng du bzhag nas zhes pa
T02D2509:231a-37: sro ta aa dza na ni rdo kha dog nag
T02D2509:231a-38: po mchog lho ni phyogs kyi chu nar ma nar
T02D2509:231a-39: te'i phu khron pa'i nang nas blangs te /
T02D2509:231a-40: nar ma nar te'i chu ma rgal bzang ngo zhes
T02D2509:231a-41: slob dpon kha cig gis bshad de zhib tu rab
T02D2509:231a-42: tu grub par byed pa'i gzhung las 'byung ba'i mtshan
T02D2509:231a-44: 'joms pa ni shes rab kyis sgrib pa thams cad rab tu 'joms pa ste /
T02D2509:231b-0: de'i @231b mtshan ma phyag rgya padmo la sogs pa'i steng du sgrub pa'i rdzas bzhag ste bsgrub po /
T02D2509:231b-1: bha ga zhes bya ba'i tshig de 'jig rten pa
T02D2509:231b-2: kha cig gis mo mtshan la bya ba skad du
T02D2509:231b-3: yang 'dren mod kyi de lta ma yin te dpal
T02D2509:231b-4: dam pa dang po'i rgyud las /
T02D2509:231b-5: bha ga zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa bcom
T02D2509:231b-6: pa ste lha'i rang gi rnam par grol ba'i mtshan
T02D2509:231b-7: ma phyag rgya la zhes bya ba 'byung bas na
T02D2509:231b-9: grub pa rnam gsum byung gi bar du bzlas so
T02D2509:231b-10: zhes pa dro ba dang dud pa 'byung ba dang
T02D2509:231b-11: 'bar ba'o // gcig gis zhes pa ni dro bas so //
T02D2509:231b-12: gnyis pas zhes pa ni dud pa 'byung bas so //
T02D2509:231b-13: gsum pa zhes bya ba ni 'bar ba ste sgrub
T02D2509:231b-14: po de yang sngar bsnyen pa tshul bzhin du byas
T02D2509:231b-15: la nub gcig sgrub pa'i mtshan thal byung bzlas pa'i
T02D2509:231b-17: gur gum la sogs pa 'byung ste //
T02D2509:231b-18: zhes bya ba gur gum dang ldong ros dang ba
T02D2509:231b-19: bla gang yang rung ba 'joms pa zhes bya ba
T02D2509:231b-20: shes rab kyi mtshan ma padmo'i phyag rgya'i steng du
T02D2509:231b-21: bzhag la / rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya gong du smos pas mnan te bsgrub /
T02D2509:231b-22: de nas banydzi ka sgrub pa ste /
T02D2509:231b-23: zhes pa sa la banydzi ka gnod sbyin mo'i gzugs gang na yod pa der bsgrub po /
T02D2509:231b-24: lag pa g-yon pas rang gi mtshan ma de bzung
T02D2509:231b-25: la zhes pa grong bar gyi phyag dar phung po
T02D2509:231b-26: de mes btang la lag pa g-yon pas rang gi
T02D2509:231b-27: ye shes kyi mtshan ma rdo rje bzung la nas
T02D2509:231b-28: sam 'bras kyi gzegs ma bsreg go //
T02D2509:231b-29: de nas ci bgyi bsgrub par 'dod pas zhes pa
T02D2509:231b-30: gnod sbyin la sogs pa bka' thams cad nyan pa'i
T02D2509:231b-31: g-yogs por sgrub pa'o// de yang bsgyel cing slar yang
T02D2509:231b-32: 'dug go zhes pa lha mo de rang gi gnas
T02D2509:231b-33: su g-yon pas bsgyel zhing slar yang sngags pa'i brtul
T02D2509:231b-34: zhugs bya bar 'dod pa zhes pa sngags pa gang
T02D2509:231b-35: rtsol ba mang du bya ste /
T02D2509:231b-36: bsgribs kyang grub pa thob pa des rig pa'i brtul zhugs byas na myur du 'grub ste /
T02D2509:231b-37: brtul zhugs bco brgyad 'og nas 'byung ba rnams las zhag bcu zhing brjes te spyad do //
T02D2509:231b-38: de nas nyin re zhing bco brgyad kyi bar du
T02D2509:231b-39: zhes pa ste de yang grub par dka' na nyi
T02D2509:231b-40: ma bco brgyad kyi bar du rig pa'i brtul zhugs
T02D2509:231b-41: bco brgyad rnams nyin re lan re bsnol bas sngar
T02D2509:232a-1: las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba ni zhi ba
T02D2509:232a-2: dang rgyas pa dang dbang dang mngon par spyad pa
T02D2509:232a-3: ste rdo rje h'um ka ra'i phyag rgya chen po'i
T02D2509:232a-4: rnal 'byor du byas la h'um zhes pa'i snying po
T02D2509:232a-5: yi ge 'bru gcig pa thang cig brjod pas so
T02D2509:232a-6: // de la rig pa'i btul zhugs bco brgyad ni
T02D2509:232a-7: slong mo la za ba dang lan cig las mi
T02D2509:232a-8: // za ba dang / 'bras bu gcig za ba dang /
T02D2509:232a-16: thang bu la nyal ba dang ;
T02D2509:232a-17: phyugs kyi rmig rjes su nyal ba dang /
T02D2509:232a-18: rtsa ba dang 'o ma 'thung ba dang /
T02D2509:232a-20: ma smras ma nyams pa'i mi ro blangs la zhes
T02D2509:232a-21: pa mi ro mtshon gyis ma smas pa nad drag
T02D2509:232a-22: pos yun ring pos lus nyams shing gzhung par ma
T02D2509:232a-23: gyur pa 'phral la shi ba'i ro'o //
T02D2509:232a-24: dbugs byung gi bar du bzlas na zhes pa ro nyid la mang du bzlas na dbugs 'byung ngo //
T02D2509:232a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur 'gyur ro //
T02D2509:232a-26: zhes pa mi ro de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2509:232a-27: skur 'gyur te sems dang yang bcas pa de phrag

T02D2509:242a-14: de bas na 'dod pa'i khro bo'i rang bzhin no //

T02D2509:242a-16: bklags pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo
T02D2509:242a-17: rje nyid kyi sku ston par mdzad de /
T02D2509:242a-18: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro //

T02D2509:242a-23: rjes su bcug nas zhes pa snying bo rdo rje

T02D2509:242a-26: bdag che kun gyi phyag rgya ni //

T02D2509:242a-28: ni bdag che ba ste yon tan kun gyis 'phags
T02D2509:242a-29: pa'i phyir ro // de'i phyag rgya ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bzhi rnams te /
T02D2509:242a-30: byang chub kyi sems 'dod pa'i rang bzhin dang ma
T02D2509:242a-31: rungs pa 'dul ba khro bo'i rang bzhin can du
T02D2509:242a-32: 'byung ste byang chub kyi sems med na phyag rgya
T02D2509:242a-34: bsam pa zhes bya ba ni skabs 'dir khro bo'i bsam pa la bya'o //
T02D2509:242a-35: sdig med ces bya ba ni slob ma la rim gro'i tshul du bod pa'o //
T02D2509:242a-36: 'dod dang bsam pa ma gtang zhig / ces pa
T02D2509:242a-37: byang chub kyi sems 'dod pa'i rang bzhin dang ma
T02D2509:242a-38: rungs pa 'dul ba'i thabs khro ba ma btang zhig
T02D2509:242a-39: de skad bsgo nas dri chu la sngags 'di btab
T02D2509:242a-40: ste blud do // sngags kyi don ni sngags bshad pa'o //

T02D2509:242a-42: dam tshig mi bsnyad pa 'ba' zhig gi phyir 'dis
T02D2509:242a-43: bsngags te blud pa yin gyi gzhan yang mnas bsgag
T02D2509:242a-44: go // cho ga 'dis bsngags te blud do zhes
T02D2509:242b-0: pa mnas @242b bsgags pa de dag la yang phyag

T02D2509:242b-2: go // blud do // de nas phyag rgya bcing
T02D2509:242b-3: ba bslab po zhes pa phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi
T02D2509:242b-4: go // blud do // bslab bo // de nas
T02D2509:242b-5: de bzhin du 'byung ngo zhes pa ci ltar gong
T02D2509:242b-6: du zas dang spyod pas tshim par byas te gyes
T02D2509:242b-7: so zhes bya ba bzhin du 'dir yang bya'o ;
T02D2509:242b-8: / de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin du
T02D2509:242b-9: bris nas zhes pa dkyil 'khor chen po bzhin du
T02D2509:242b-10: srad bu bres nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams cha
T02D2509:242b-11: lugs sam phyag rgya'i mtshan ma gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2509:242b-12: der btsud nas las bzhi bslab par bya'o zhes pa
T02D2509:242b-13: zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sogs pa'i las rnam
T02D2509:242b-14: bzhi slob mas bslab pa'am bdag rang gis bya'o //
T02D2509:242b-15: yang na las rnam bzhi ni mod bzhin du 'byung ba bzhin rnams la bya'o //
T02D2509:242b-16: de la dang po ni 'dod pa thams cad stsol
T02D2509:242b-17: bar 'gyur te zhes pa las dang po ni yid
T02D2509:242b-18: la bsams pa'i 'dod pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur
T02D2509:242b-19: te / phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po
T02D2509:242b-20: bcings nas takki h'um dza zhes bya ba'i snying po
T02D2509:242b-21: te / bzlas so // de nas khro bo'i las brlab ste //
T02D2509:242b-22: zhes pa las gnyis pa h'um ka ra'i phyag rgya
T02D2509:242b-23: chen po'i rnal 'byor byas la takki h'um dza zhes
T02D2509:242b-24: bya ba'i snying po bzlas shing sngar bsnyen pa byas
T02D2509:242b-25: la snying po thang cig bzlas pa dang /
T02D2509:242b-26: h'um zhes bya ba'i snying po mdzub mo bsgreng ste
T02D2509:242b-27: thang cig bsdigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa yang rang
T02D2509:242b-28: gi gnas nas bskyod de sngags pa'i drung du byon
T02D2509:242b-31: sems can la sogs pa 'gul ba rnams dang /
T02D2509:242b-32: gnas te ri la sogs pa thams cad kyang 'gyel bar nus so //
T02D2509:242b-33: de nas phyag na rdo rje las 'byung ste zhes pa las gsum pa ste /
T02D2509:242b-34: sems can thams cad gong du smos pa lta bu'i
T02D2509:242b-35: 'dod pa dang khro bar 'dul bar 'dod na rdo
T02D2509:242b-36: rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya gong du smos pa bcings
T02D2509:242b-37: la takki h'um dza zhes bya ba'i snying po zlos
T02D2509:242b-38: shing me tog la sogs pa mchod pa lngas mchod
T02D2509:242b-39: par bya ste de nas phyag na rdo rje'i snying
T02D2509:242b-40: po'i phyag rgya mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ba snying gar
T02D2509:242b-41: bcings te takki h'um dza bzlas so //
T02D2509:243a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bya bar 'dod na @243a * //
T02D2509:243a-1: zhes pa las bzhi pa ste de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2509:243a-2: lnga nyid grub par 'dod na phyag na rdo rje'i
T02D2509:243a-3: spyan sngar byang chub kyi sems rnam pa lnga gong
T02D2509:243a-4: du smos pa gang yang rung ba bskyed la /

T02D2509:243a-7: la gnas te sems can gyi don du bya ba

T02D2509:243a-9: byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro de nas bsgrub pa
T02D2509:243a-10: 'byung ste zhes pa phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2509:243a-11: bzhi gong du smos pa de rnams kyi sgrub pa

T02D2509:243a-17: bshad par bya'o // ba'i phyir ro // smras pa
T02D2509:243a-18: / dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa la zhes
T02D2509:243a-20: cho ga bzhin du dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa dang /
T02D2509:243a-21: dkyil 'khor du zhugs kyang rigs bzhi'i spyi'i dam tshig
T02D2509:243a-22: dang rigs so so'i dam tshig mi shes pa dang
T02D2509:243a-23: / slob dpon rang gis dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa

T02D2509:243a-26: ni sngags kyi snying po mi zad pa ste bsod

T02D2509:243a-28: / mi sbyin no // phyir ro // 'di ni
T02D2509:243a-29: dkyil 'khor sgrub ste zhes god bzhin 'og nas dkyil
T02D2509:243a-30: 'khor mthong bar sgrub pa zhes 'byung ba nyid la
T02D2509:243a-31: bya ste gong du smos pa'i dkyil 'khor gang yang
T02D2509:243a-32: rung ba mthong nas dkyil 'khor de nyid du phyag

T02D2509:243a-36: / mi sbyin no // phyir ro // te /

T02D2509:243a-38: bsnyen pa 'di mi sbyar mi rung ngo //

T02D2509:243a-40: bzlas so zhes 'byung ba thams cad ni takki h'um
T02D2509:243a-41: dza zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di bzlas pa rig
T02D2509:243a-42: par bya'o // de nas ras la bris te ras
T02D2509:243a-43: kyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2509:243a-44: dri zhes pa ras gtsang ma skra dang bal bu

T02D2509:243a-47: yan lag sdom pa can tshon rtsi sbyin med pa
T02D2509:243b-0: man chad kyang bsgrub pa'i ri mo thams @243b cad ni cho ga bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2509:243b-1: dbus su rnam par snang mdzad bris la /

T02D2509:243b-3: po 'dod pa dang khro bo'i gzugs kha dog dmar

T02D2509:243b-16: dang khro ba'i rang bzhin te de rnams bri'o //
T02D2509:243b-17: grvar mchod pa'i lha rang gi mchod pas 'gram pa
T02D2509:243b-18: dang mgo bor zhes pa ras kyi grva bzhir mchod

T02D2509:243b-25: bzlas pa'i tshe phyag bya ba dang /
T02D2509:243b-27: gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pa bdag sbyang ba dang /
T02D2509:243b-32: mchod pa dang dgug ba dang /

T02D2509:243b-35: mtshams bcad pa dang bsrung ba la sogs pa'i cho

T02D2509:243b-37: so zhes zer ba thams cad la yang de bzhin
T02D2509:243b-38: du sbyar ro // dus bzhir stong bzlas shing zhes pa nang par dang /

T02D2509:243b-43: zhes ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po

T02D2509:244a-2: pa sngags pas bza' bar mi rigs pa ma gtogs
T02D2509:244a-3: pa gzhan ci dga' bar zos nas bzlas so //
T02D2509:244a-4: ras la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de
T02D2509:244a-5: bzhin du bris la zhes pa phyag na rdo rje
T02D2509:244a-6: nyag gcig phyag bzhi la sogs pa ji ltar gong
T02D2509:244a-7: du smos pa bzhin du bri'o //

T02D2509:244a-9: bo de bzhin du bris la zhes pa 'dod pa
T02D2509:244a-10: khro bo phyag na rdo rje'i snying ga nas byung
T02D2509:244a-11: ba gong du smos pa bzhin du bri'o //
T02D2509:244a-12: rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje h'um ka ra'i phyag rgya mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ba'o //
T02D2509:244a-13: des kyang longs spyod par nus na /
T02D2509:244a-14: zhes pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa nas
T02D2509:244a-15: bde ba thams cad bkug la sngags pa la byin
T02D2509:244a-16: nas sngags pas kyang longs spyad par nus na lha'i
T02D2509:244a-17: bu mo 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni gnas pa

T02D2509:244a-21: phyag rgya mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ba bcing ngo //
T02D2509:244a-22: rdo rje bzhag ste de'i mdun du 'bum bzlas na
T02D2509:244a-23: zhes pa gser dngul lam zangs kyi rdo rje mdun
T02D2509:244a-25: phyag rgya chen po bcings nas zhes pa phyag na
T02D2509:244a-26: rdo rje'i lus kyis gsang ba'i rnal 'byor byas nas
T02D2509:244a-27: so // dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas zhes
T02D2509:244a-28: pa phyag na rdo rje'i dam tshig phyag rgya rdo
T02D2509:244a-29: rje rtse lnga pa gong du smos pa'o //
T02D2509:244a-30: lag pa gnyis rdo rje bcings pa bsdams la zhes
T02D2509:244a-31: pa rdo rje'i bcing ba ni lag pa gnyis g-yas
T02D2509:244a-32: pa gong du byas nas sor mo bsnol te chang
T02D2509:244a-33: pa bsdams pa'o // dpal mo la bltas te 'bum
T02D2509:244a-34: bzlas na dbang du 'gyur ro zhes pa dpal mo
T02D2509:244a-35: la bud med kyi cha lugs lag na dpal mo
T02D2509:244a-36: thogs pa bri ba'am byas pa la bltas te bzlas
T02D2509:244a-37: na de nyid dbang du 'gyur te ci bsgo ba
T02D2509:244a-38: pa bsdams pa'o // byed do // mtsho dbyangs ma
T02D2509:244a-39: la bltas te zhes pa lha mo sa ra svasti
T02D2509:244a-40: ni ngag la dbang thob pa ste /
T02D2509:244a-41: de grub na bdag gis ji skad smras pa ste kun kyang brtson par 'gyur la /
T02D2509:244a-42: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtsug lag dang /
T02D2509:244a-43: bzo dang sman la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa thams cad shes par 'gyur ro //
T02D2509:244b-0: @244b grub byed ma bzung nas zhes pa gcer bu
T02D2509:244b-1: ba'i bud med kyi gzugs shig yod pa'i cha lugs
T02D2509:244b-2: la lag pas bzung nas bzlas so //
T02D2509:244b-3: sa la banydzi ka ni gnod sbyin ma bud med kyi gzugs so //
T02D2509:244b-4: ri la 'dzegs te 'bum bzlas na rtsi thams cad
T02D2509:244b-5: dbang du 'gyur ro zhes pa ri las skyes pa'i
T02D2509:244b-6: rtsi thams cad bdag gis mthong zhing brtsal na rnyed
T02D2509:244b-7: par 'gyur ro // phyugs thams cad la dbang du
T02D2509:244b-8: 'gyur ro zhes pa 'gyen 'phra dang rgal gtso la
T02D2509:244b-10: gnas chen por 'bum bzlas nas zhes pa tshong pa
T02D2509:244b-11: phyogs bzhi nas 'du ba'i thun mong gi gnas so
T02D2509:244b-12: // gtsug lag khang du 'bum bzlas na zhes pa
T02D2509:244b-13: de na gnas pa'i lha klu la sogs dang rab
T02D2509:244b-14: tu 'byung ba dag gis nor ster ro //
T02D2509:244b-15: lha'i rten du 'bum bzlas na zhes pa lha chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i lha'o //
T02D2509:244b-16: cang mi zer bar 'bum bzlas na zhes pa sgra mi 'byung bar yid kyis bzlas pa'o //
T02D2509:244b-17: lkugs pa'i brtul zhugs kyis zhes pa mi smra ba'i
T02D2509:244b-18: dka' thub kyang blangs la sngags yid kyis bzlas so
T02D2509:244b-19: // 'joms pa la sor mo btsugs te 'bum bzlas
T02D2509:244b-20: na zhes pa 'joms pa ni sgrib pa thams cad
T02D2509:244b-22: rang gi rnam par grol ba'i mtshan ma phyag rgya la bya'o //
T02D2509:244b-23: phyag rgya padmo la mdzub mos btsugs te bzlas so //
T02D2509:244b-24: 'og nas 'byung ba zhes bya ba yang rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgya padmo la bya'o //
T02D2509:244b-25: 'dod pa'i bdag po dang byed pa po dang zhes
T02D2509:244b-26: pa gong du phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar phyag
T02D2509:244b-27: rgya chen po bcings la dkyil 'khor chen por 'dug
T02D2509:244b-28: nas bzlas pa'i 'bras bu ste 'dod pa ni byang
T02D2509:244b-30: de la gtso bor spyod pas na bdag po'o //
T02D2509:244b-31: yang na 'dod pa rnam pa lnga la dbang byed
T02D2509:244b-32: pas na bdag por gyur kyang la la la bar
T02D2509:244b-33: chad du byung ba srid de /

T02D2509:248a-8: ba ba ni bcings pa med par ston to //
