T02D2509:248a-10: ha ha ni nan gyis mnan pa med par ston to //
T02D2509:248a-11: de nas brjod pa ni zhes pa nam mkha'i snying po 'di rin po che'i rigs yin la /
T02D2509:248a-12: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dam tshig tu
T02D2509:248a-13: len pas de'i snying po brjod pa tsam gyis don
T02D2509:248a-15: rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la yang dbu rgyan
T02D2509:248a-16: dang dpung rgyan la sogs pa so sor ci rigs
T02D2509:248a-18: rdo rje dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin de //
T02D2509:248a-19: zhes pa phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dang por
T02D2509:248a-20: smos pa de'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul bzhin
T02D2509:248a-21: du bris te phyi rim du gser gyi ri dang
T02D2509:248a-23: khor yug dang de dag tu gnas pa'i lha 'dre la sogs pa yang gong ma bzhin du bri'o //
T02D2509:248a-24: rdo rje rin chen mnyam ldan zhing //
T02D2509:248a-25: zhes pa ni nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi mthar ri
T02D2509:248a-26: mo ni rin po che rdo rje can gyis bsgreng
T02D2509:248a-27: ngo // cha brgyad shin tu mnyam par bya //
T02D2509:248a-28: zhes nang gi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi'i mtha' dkyil 'khor
T02D2509:248a-29: gyi re'u brgyad kyis bskor ba'i dbus na nam mkha'i
T02D2509:248a-30: snying po bzhugs shing 'khor byang chub sems dpa' gzhan
T02D2509:248a-31: gyis bskor ba 'og nas 'byung ba bzhin dgod do
T02D2509:248a-32: // rin chen thams cad snyoms ldan pa //
T02D2509:248a-33: zhes pa ka ba la sogs pa'i mdo mdor rin
T02D2509:248a-34: po che sna lnga pa thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o
T02D2509:248a-35: // de nas slob dpon der bzhugs te rdo rje
T02D2509:248a-36: rin po che'i phyag rgya 'og nas 'byung ba dbang
T02D2509:248a-37: bskur ba'i gnas dpral bar gzhag ste /
T02D2509:248a-38: de nas bskul ba'i phyir tshigs bcad 'di lhogs shig / re ba thams cad grub pa yi //
T02D2509:248a-39: zhes bya ba ste yid la bsam pa grub pa
T02D2509:248a-40: thams cad kyi nang na nam mkha' grub pa'i mchog
T02D2509:248a-41: yin te / de ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
T02D2509:248a-42: nam mkha' la nor thams cad 'grub pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2509:248b-0: sems dpa' chen pos de thams cad grub @248b par gyur cig pa'i don to //
T02D2509:248b-1: skyes bu chen po brgyad gzhag par bya'o zhes pa
T02D2509:248b-2: dang po'i dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' brgyad
T02D2509:248b-3: rnam par snang mdzad dang dgu bzhugs pa las rnam
T02D2509:248b-4: par snang mdzad dang nam mkha'i snying po go brjes
T02D2509:248b-6: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2509:248b-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dam tshig gi don bstan pa ste /
T02D2509:248b-8: 'gro ba kun la phan gdags pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2509:248b-9: sbyin ba la sogs pas 'gro ba kun la phan
T02D2509:248b-10: gdags pa'i phyir da ltar yang re ba yongs su
T02D2509:248b-11: bskung ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' 'di
T02D2509:248b-12: thams cad ni re ba yongs su bskang ba de'i
T02D2509:248b-14: de nas snying po byin la zhes pa slob ma
T02D2509:248b-15: la snying po byin nas rin po che sna lnga
T02D2509:248b-16: bcug pa'i bum pa la sngags 'di bzlas te dbang
T02D2509:248b-17: bskur ro // de'i don ni rdo rje rin po
T02D2509:248b-18: ches chos thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ba'i phyir
T02D2509:248b-19: bskur ro // dbang bskur ro // de nas rdo
T02D2509:248b-20: rje rin po che'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste zhes bya
T02D2509:248b-21: ba nam mkha' mdzod rin po che'i rigs su gtogs
T02D2509:248b-22: pas na rin po che'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ste
T02D2509:248b-23: bskur ro // dbang bskur ro // / padmo'i rigs la padmo'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba bzhin no //
T02D2509:248b-24: de nas dkyil 'khor gong ma bzhin du bris la
T02D2509:248b-25: de'i dbus su rdo rje dang ldan pa'i rin po
T02D2509:248b-27: sngags pa'i lag tu yang nor bu rin po che
T02D2509:248b-28: gang yang rung ba thogs nas dkyil 'khor du bris
T02D2509:248b-29: pa'i rin po che langs kyi bar du bzlas so
T02D2509:248b-30: // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa byon te sngags
T02D2509:248b-31: pa la dbang bskur na chos thams cad la dbang
T02D2509:248b-33: de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor te zhes pa
T02D2509:248b-34: dkyil 'khor gong ma bzhin du bris la nam mkha'i
T02D2509:248b-35: snying po'i sku dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhugs pa'i
T02D2509:248b-36: spyan sngar nor ke dha ra dang /
T02D2509:248b-37: pa na la sogs pa bzhag nas de nas slob
T02D2509:248b-38: ma bcug ste kun bstan la dam tshig bsgo ba
T02D2509:248b-39: / sangs rgyas la sogs sems dpa' dag gces bya ba dag go //
T02D2509:248b-40: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dag la nyin re zhing mchod pa mi chad par bya'o //
T02D2509:248b-41: gal te chad na nor thams cad yal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2509:248b-42: de na sam na'i chus dbang bskur ro //
T02D2509:248b-43: mana'i snying pos bsngags pa'i chu spyi bor blug go //
T02D2509:249a-0: las kyi dkyil 'khor bris la zhes pa gzhan ni gong ma bzhin @249a * //
T02D2509:249a-2: de'i dbus su rnam par snang mdzad rgyan thams cad
T02D2509:249a-3: kyis brgyan te bzhugs la der slob ma gzhug go
T02D2509:249a-4: // de nas las rnam pa lnga bslab pa ni dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2509:249a-5: dbang bskur ba ni phreng ba dang bum pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2509:249a-6: nor ni gser dngul la sogs pa'o //
T02D2509:249a-7: zang zing ni nas dang 'bras bu la sogs pa byol song 'dod pa rnams so //
T02D2509:249a-8: mi snang ba'i sems can rnams zhes bya ba lha la sogs pa'o //
T02D2509:249a-9: rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba
T02D2509:249a-10: bris te zhes pa rnam par snang mdzad rin po
T02D2509:249a-11: che'i phreng bas dbu brgyan zhes bya ba'i tha tshig
T02D2509:249a-12: go // bcom ldan 'das la dbang bskur ba'i phreng
T02D2509:249a-13: bas zhes pa nam mkha'i snying po nyid rin po
T02D2509:249a-14: che'i phreng ba phyag gnyis na thogs la rnam par
T02D2509:249a-15: snang mdzad kyi dbu la gdags pa ltar bzo bos
T02D2509:249a-16: go // bri'o // de nas ma bsgrubs par yang
T02D2509:249a-17: las su 'gyur ba ni zhes pa bsgrub pa'i cho
T02D2509:249a-18: ga ma byas par yang sngar bsnyen pa mang du
T02D2509:249a-19: byas pa las su rung bar bshad pa'o //
T02D2509:249a-20: 'bum bzlas na don thams cad phun sum tshogs par
T02D2509:249a-21: 'gyur ro zhes pa bsnyen pa de tsam byas pas
T02D2509:249a-22: lha mngon du 'gyur bas zhi ba la sogs pa'i
T02D2509:249a-23: don sgrub pa rnams 'grub ces pa'i tha tshig go
T02D2509:249a-24: // phyag na rdo rje dang spyan ras gzigs dbang
T02D2509:249a-25: po la sogs pa'i spyan sngar bsngags pa'i ni nam
T02D2509:249a-26: mkha'i snying po'i sngags ba ba ta ta zhes bya
T02D2509:249a-28: chos kyi nor dang gzungs 'thob bo zhes pa rtogs pa'i chos dang /
T02D2509:249a-29: bshad pa'i chos kyi longs spyod thob pa'o //
T02D2509:249a-30: sngags dang don dang gzhung dang tshig gi gzugs 'thob cing /
T02D2509:249a-31: 'dod pa rnam pa lnga la sogs pa'i nor yang 'phel bar byed do //
T02D2509:249a-32: rdo rje'i 'khor lo srin lag gi sor mos mnan
T02D2509:249a-33: te zhes pa sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi
T02D2509:249a-34: 'khor lo bskor ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs
T02D2509:249a-35: la'o // 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur zhes pa ni 'khor lo bskor ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //
T02D2509:249a-36: nam mkha' mdzod kun nas 'khyud de zhes pa de'i sku gzugs la lag pas 'khyud de'o //
T02D2509:249a-37: dga' ldan gnam gyi dbang mchog byin nas zhes pa
T02D2509:249a-38: der phyin nas don thams cad pa'i dbang bskur ro
T02D2509:249a-39: // nam mkha'i snying po'i rtog pa rdzogs so /
T02D2509:249b-0: // / de @249b nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi byang
T02D2509:249b-1: chub sems dpa' zhes pa lha ma yin la sogs
T02D2509:249b-2: pa'i 'khor bzlog cing sdod mi phod pas zil gyis
T02D2509:249b-3: gnon pa'o // grub pa thams cad 'grub par bya
T02D2509:249b-4: ste zhes pa grub pa'i skal ba yod pa rnams
T02D2509:249b-5: 'grub par byas nas sems can de dang po byang
T02D2509:249b-6: chub tu sems bskyed pa nas mthar sangs rgyas su
T02D2509:249b-7: rdzogs kyi bar du sems can gyi don mang por
T02D2509:249b-8: gnon pa'o // byas pa'o // sngags kyi don ni aom yang snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2509:249b-9: ru tya ru tya ni 'gyur ba ste /
T02D2509:249b-10: ma rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin du rdzogs par byed pa lta bu'o //
T02D2509:249b-11: h'um ni mngon par spyad pa ste /
T02D2509:249b-13: ma ta ni snang ba ste ma ni nyi ma'i sa bon no //
T02D2509:249b-14: ta ni zla ba'i sa bon yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2509:249b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag rgyas btab
T02D2509:249b-16: nas zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi lus dang ngag
T02D2509:249b-17: dang yid gsum gcig tu bsdus pa ni khu tshur
T02D2509:249b-18: te de'i phyag rgya bcings pa na de bzhin gshegs
T02D2509:249b-19: pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin bsdus pa ni rgyas
T02D2509:249b-22: zhes pa dkyil 'khor dang po smos pa'i rdo rje'i
T02D2509:249b-23: dkyil 'khor bzhin du ri dang chu dang gling dang
T02D2509:249b-24: sems can gyi gnas pa la sogs pa'ang de bzhin
T02D2509:249b-25: du bri'o // de'i nang rim gyi dbus su rdo
T02D2509:249b-26: rje khu tshur zhes bya ba'i sems dpa' chen po'i
T02D2509:249b-27: gzugs sam cha lugs bzhag go //
T02D2509:249b-29: rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje bcangs //
T02D2509:249b-31: 'di'i skabs su rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa nyid
T02D2509:249b-32: rdo rje khu tshur gyi sgrar bshad de de'i dbus
T02D2509:249b-33: su rdo rje rtse lnga pa bcug la mdzub mo
T02D2509:249b-34: g-yas g-yon gyi lag pa gzhan pas drag tu btsir
T02D2509:249b-35: ba'o // de yi thad kar thams cad du //
T02D2509:249b-36: sangs rgyas sku lus gzhag par bya //
T02D2509:249b-37: zhes pa de'i phyogs bzhir mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhi bzhugs par bya'o //
T02D2509:249b-38: de'i grva bzhir byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang /
T02D2509:249b-41: sna tshogs rdo rje rnams bri'o //
T02D2509:249b-42: de nas dkyil 'khor de dang por slob dpon 'jug pa'i cho ga gsungs pa /
T02D2509:249b-43: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor dag ces pa dag go //
T02D2509:249b-44: de la sngags kyi don h'um ni mngon par spyad pa'i don to //
T02D2509:249b-45: dakshi ni lha nyid sbyin gnas su bstan to //
T02D2509:250a-0: sma ra ni sngon gyi dam tshig @250a * //
T02D2509:250a-1: dran par byos shig par bskul ba'o //
T02D2509:250a-2: phat ni mngon par spyad pa'o //
T02D2509:250a-3: de nas snying po 'dis bdag gi snying gar dgrol
T02D2509:250a-4: lo zhes pa khu tshur gyi phyag rgya gong du
T02D2509:250a-5: bcings pa sngags kyi mthu dam por gyur pa sngags
T02D2509:250a-7: sngags kyi don ni rdo rje khu tshur slar grol bar gyur cig ces pa'i don to //
T02D2509:250a-8: de nas rdo rje slob ma gzhug ste zhes pa
T02D2509:250a-9: ye shes kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i slob ma ni
T02D2509:250a-11: rdo rje slob dpon yang de dang 'dra'o //
T02D2509:250a-12: rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdo
T02D2509:250a-13: rje dang bcas pa ni gong du lha'i phyag rgya
T02D2509:250a-14: bshad pa'i skabs su smos pa de nyid bcings la
T02D2509:250a-15: me tog gi phreng ba phyag rgya des bzung nas
T02D2509:250a-16: 'jug go // deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2509:250a-17: cad kyi phyag rgyas btab pa ni zhes pa slob
T02D2509:250a-19: dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pas na de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2509:250a-20: thams cad kyi chos dang ye shes kyi phyag rgyas
T02D2509:250a-22: de la chos kyi phyag rgya ni dag gi gsang ba'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2509:250a-23: rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni sems kyi gsang ba'i rang
T02D2509:250a-24: bzhin te phyag rgya de gnyis gang 'dod pa slob
T02D2509:250a-26: slob ma gnyis ka 'dod ces zer na de gnyi ga'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D2509:250a-27: de'i cho ga gsungs pa rdo rje dang /
T02D2509:250a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa'i cha lugs zhes pa dag go //
T02D2509:250a-29: cha lugs de nyid dkyil 'khor na bzhugs pa las blangs nas me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02D2509:250a-30: rdo rje dang cig car du slob ma'i mgo la gzhag go //
T02D2509:250a-31: lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje'i zhes pa sangs
T02D2509:250a-32: rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang ngag yid
T02D2509:250a-33: kyi gsang ba rdo rje rnams gcig tu bsdus pa
T02D2509:250a-34: ni rdo rje'i khu tshur zhes bya'o //
T02D2509:250a-35: de nas phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste zhes pa
T02D2509:250a-36: rdo rje khu tshur ni las kyi rigs pas na
T02D2509:250a-37: phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor zhes bshad do //
T02D2509:250a-38: de'i dbus su ci rigs par zhes pa rnam par
T02D2509:250a-39: snang mdzad rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings
T02D2509:250a-41: de'i phyogs bzhi'i shar phyogs nas brtsams te zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje dang /
T02D2509:250a-42: rin po che dang padmo dang rgya gram byang phyogs kyi bar du gzhag go //
T02D2509:250a-43: rdo rje padmo'i dbus zhes bya ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag ste /
T02D2509:250b-0: rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pas @250b na rdo rje
T02D2509:250b-1: padmo ste rdo rje nyid der bri ba ni ma
T02D2509:250b-2: yin no // grva rnams su yang dus bzhi'i lha
T02D2509:250b-3: mo'i mchod pa gong du smos pa rnams bri ste
T02D2509:250b-5: slob ma dkyil 'khor du bcug la //
T02D2509:250b-6: phyag rgya rnam bzhi yang slobs shig / sgrub pa gsang ba dag dang ni //
T02D2509:250b-7: zhes pa la sogs pa de dag kun dkyil 'khor
T02D2509:250b-8: du bris nas slob ma la yang kun brjod cing
T02D2509:250b-9: so so'i cho ga bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2509:250b-10: de la sgrub pa ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2509:250b-11: gsang ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gsang ba'o //
T02D2509:250b-12: 'khyud pa ni rdo rje khu tshur gsang ba thams
T02D2509:250b-13: cad bsdus pa'i rang bzhin no zhes bya ba nyid
T02D2509:250b-14: 'khyud pa'o // bskul ba ni sngon gyi dam tshig dran par byos shig ces smras pa'o //
T02D2509:250b-15: de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste zhes
T02D2509:250b-16: pa dam tshig dkyil 'khor yang gzhan ni gong ma
T02D2509:250b-18: lha rnams kyi mtshan ma phyag rgya rnams der dgod do //
T02D2509:250b-19: de ste dkyil 'khor ma mthong la zhes pa dam
T02D2509:250b-20: tshig can ma yin pa la phyag rgya bstan na
T02D2509:250b-21: rigs bzhi char gyi lha rnams bka' 'bab par 'gyur
T02D2509:250b-23: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs ni rdo rje'o //
T02D2509:250b-24: de ltar rim bzhin du sbyar te sna tshogs rdo rje'i bar du'o //
T02D2509:250b-25: sna tshogs ni rdo rje rgya gram la bya'o //
T02D2509:250b-26: de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste zhes pa dkyil 'khor gong ma bzhin du bris la /
T02D2509:250b-27: rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyan sngar phyag rgya bcing ba'i ri pa bslab po //
T02D2509:250b-29: rdo rje bcing ba kun byas la //
T02D2509:250b-30: zhes pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ngo //
T02D2509:250b-31: cho ga dang po rdo rje bcing ba byas la de nas sor mo thams cad dral bar bya'o //
T02D2509:250b-32: de nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya bcing ngo //
T02D2509:250b-33: de nas rdo rje bcings pa las lag pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings pa thams cad bya'o //
T02D2509:250b-34: de lta bur mi ldan na zhes phyag rgya'o //
T02D2509:250b-35: rim pa gong du smos pa bzhin du bya bar
T02D2509:250b-36: mi ldan na byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa
T02D2509:250b-37: 'dod pa'i mchog sgrub pa'i sngags pas dam tshig chen
T02D2509:250b-38: po'i yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi snying po sa
T02D2509:250b-39: ma ya stvam zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i spyi'i
T02D2509:250b-40: dam tshig gi sngags thang cig zlos la /
T02D2509:250b-41: de nas phyag rgya thams cad chings shig /'dod pa'i
T02D2509:250b-42: mchog thams cad sgrub pa ni zhes pa byang chub
T02D2509:250b-43: kyi sems bsgrub pa ni phyag rgya gong du smos
T02D2509:251a-0: pa @251a * // la sogs pa nyid la rag lus zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2509:251a-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi
T02D2509:251a-2: sgrub pa 'byung ste zhes pa dkyil 'khor gong du
T02D2509:251a-3: smos pa rnams kyi sgrub pa'i cho ga 'dir bshad
T02D2509:251a-4: de / 'og nas sgrub pa dang las 'byung ba
T02D2509:251a-5: rnams kyi dang po spyi'i bsnyen pa 'bum bya'o zhes
T02D2509:251a-6: bstan pa 'o ma 'thung zhing rdo rje khu tshur
T02D2509:251a-7: gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2509:251a-8: rdo rje dbang bskur bar dar gyis bcings la zhes
T02D2509:251a-9: pa rdo rje khu tshur gyi nang du rdo rje
T02D2509:251a-10: rtse lnga pa bcug la rdo rje bcings ba byas
T02D2509:251a-11: nas dbang bskur ba'i gnas bral ba nas dar gyis
T02D2509:251a-12: dkri bar bya'o // de'i g-yas g-yon phyogs bzhir de
T02D2509:251a-13: bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa 'khor
T02D2509:251a-14: byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa bri'o //
T02D2509:251a-15: de la sangs rgyas rnams ni rdo rje bcings pa'i phyag rgyas bzhugs par bya'o //
T02D2509:251a-16: de dag gi 'khor byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul du bzhugs par bya'o //
T02D2509:251a-17: de nas de'i spyan sngar de bzhin gshegs pa thams

T02D2509:251a-37: g-yas pa mchog sbyin de'i g-yon du padmo chen po

T02D2509:251b-1: thogs pa'o // padmo chen po zhes bya ba ni

T02D2509:251b-10: zhes du ruka dang 'bru mar sbyar ba'i 'bru mar gyis sbags pa'o //

T02D2509:251b-17: 'dod pa'i gzugs zhes bya ba ci 'dod pa'i lus 'thob bo //
T02D2509:251b-18: bcing ba thams cad dang mnan pa dang zhes pa

T02D2509:252a-11: gyur pa byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol

T02D2509:252a-16: brjod pa'i chos ni gsung rab sde bcu gnyis la sogs pa'o //

T02D2509:252a-18: 'bru lnga pa'i snying po 'dir 'dus zhes pa'i don

T02D2509:252a-26: yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang rang bzhin med pa nyid mtshungs pa ste /
T02D2509:252a-27: don de dag 'bru lnga pa'i snying po 'dis bstan to //
T02D2509:252a-28: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grub pa
T02D2509:252a-29: thob par 'gyur to zhes pa shes rab kyi pha
T02D2509:252a-30: rol tu phyin pa'i don stong pa nyid rtogs zhes
T02D2509:252a-32: de nas de'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste zhes pa 'jam
T02D2509:252a-33: dpal gyi dkyil 'khor ni phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil

T02D2509:252b-3: go // rdo rje ral gri zhes bya ba ni ye shes so //
T02D2509:252b-4: de'i mtshan ma ral gri yin pas na rdo rje ral gri zhes bya'o //
T02D2509:252b-5: de'i thad kar thams cad du yi ge aa ra
T02D2509:252b-6: pa tsa na la sogs pa'i phreng ba bri zhes
T02D2509:252b-7: pa 'jam dpal gyi drung du yi ge 'bru lnga
T02D2509:252b-8: pa kha dog dmar po mgo mnyam du 'khor bar
T02D2509:252b-9: bskor ro // sogs pa'i sgras ni yi ge 'bru lnga'i don bshad pa 'og nas 'khor bar bri'o //

T02D2509:252b-11: 'jug pa'i cho ga bstan pa de nas slob dpon
T02D2509:252b-12: gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2509:252b-13: dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni 'og nas 'byung ngo //

T02D2509:252b-15: brjod do zhes pa spros pa med pa ni 'jam

T02D2509:252b-17: pa'i phyir ro // de phyin chad slob dpon la

T02D2509:252b-29: deng khyod kyis dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pas de bzhin
T02D2509:252b-30: gshegs pa'i chos stong pa nyid rtogs par 'gyur gyis
T02D2509:252b-31: snying po 'og nas 'byung ba dam tshig can ma

T02D2509:252b-43: pa'o zhes bya ba sems can smin pa dang grol

T02D2509:253a-0: pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'o zhes @253a * //

T02D2509:253a-3: byang chub kyi spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa

T02D2509:253a-6: bya ba chos thams cad dngos po med pa ste
T02D2509:253a-7: chos dang gang zag la bdag med pa'i phyir ro

T02D2509:253a-14: snod dam rgyu yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2509:253a-15: rdo rje 'dzin kyang myur du 'thob par 'gyur ro

T02D2509:253a-19: 'jam dpal gyi phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa
T02D2509:253a-21: spros pa med pa'o zhes bya ba ni chos kyi
T02D2509:253a-22: sku'i rang bzhin tshig dang don sna tshogs su spros
T02D2509:253a-23: pa med pa'i don ston pa'i dkyil 'khor bas na
T02D2509:253a-24: spros pa med pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o //
T02D2509:253a-25: de nas ral gri'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste zhes pa
T02D2509:253a-26: dkyil 'khor 'dir ral gri sgrub pas na ral gri'i
T02D2509:253a-27: dkyil 'khor te / dang po nyid du phyag na
T02D2509:253a-28: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes smos pa de bzhin du
T02D2509:253a-29: dkyil 'khor te / bri'o // de nas dkyil 'khor
T02D2509:253a-30: de'i dbus su bsgrub par bya ba'i ral gri bzhag
T02D2509:253a-31: ste mtshan thal byung bzlas te bsgrub po //

T02D2509:253a-33: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ni zhes pa dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul bzhin du bris la /
T02D2509:253a-34: der slob dpon dang slob ma gnyi ga cho ga
T02D2509:253a-35: gong ma bzhin du zhugs nas slob ma la nyin
T02D2509:253a-36: gcig cing rtag tu tshig 'di skad brjod cig ces
T02D2509:253a-37: bsgo'o // de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste zhes pa dkyil 'khor gong ma bzhin bris te /
T02D2509:253a-38: des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs
T02D2509:253a-39: bam gzhag la 'dri ba la sogs pa mchod pa
T02D2509:253a-40: rnam pa bzhi'o // de nas sgrub pa 'dod pas

T02D2509:253b-0: zhes pa dkyil 'khor chen @253b po'i tshul bzhin du

T02D2509:253b-3: sngar aa ra pa tsa na zhes bya ba'i yi

T02D2509:253b-20: ti'i g-yas phyogs nas bskor te /

T02D2509:253b-24: sngags pas bskor zhing sngags pa de nyid 'bum bzlas
T02D2509:253b-25: du bskor ro // so // 'jam dpal gyi rtog pa rdzogs so /
T02D2509:253b-27: // / de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje 'khor
T02D2509:253b-28: lo byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to
T02D2509:253b-29: // sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i byang chub sems dpas gsol pa'o //
T02D2509:253b-30: gang gi brjod pa tsam gyis dkyil 'khor thams cad
T02D2509:253b-31: du zhugs par 'gyur ro zhes phyag rgya 'og nas

T02D2509:253b-33: kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro
T02D2509:253b-34: // sngags kyi don aom sngar bshad pa'o //
T02D2509:253b-35: badzra ni ye shes su ston to //
T02D2509:253b-36: tsakra ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar ston to //
T02D2509:253b-37: stong pa nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i ye shes
T02D2509:253b-38: kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te nyon mongs pa
T02D2509:253b-39: dang shes bya'i sgrib pa h'um zhes brjod pas 'joms

T02D2509:254a-1: smos pa'i 'khor lo chen po bzhin du 'khor lo'i

T02D2509:254a-10: 'khor la sogs pa'i zhes pa shar phyogs la sogs

T02D2509:254a-23: phyag rgya 'og nas 'byung ba bcings nas snying po

T02D2509:254a-25: bam ho:zhes bya ba 'di bzhi yang smos so //
T02D2509:254a-30: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes te zhes pa dkyil
T02D2509:254a-31: 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga de ltar byas pas
T02D2509:254a-32: sngags pa dam tshig tu 'gyur te sngags kyi tshul
T02D2509:254a-34: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yang dgyes te /

T02D2509:254a-36: de bzhin du slob ma bcug nas de nyid du
T02D2509:254a-37: bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa rdo rje 'khor lo'i dam

T02D2509:254a-39: ltar slob dpon dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga

T02D2509:254a-42: bzlas pa'i sgrub pa bya ste /

T02D2509:254a-44: rdo rje 'khor lo la phyag rgya 'og nas 'byung ba bcings la bzlas so //
T02D2509:254a-45: dkyil 'khor rnying na dus su brje'o //
T02D2509:254a-46: de nas rdo rje dkyil 'khor bstan pa rdo rje
T02D2509:254b-0: 'khor lo'i dbus su rdo rje bris te @254b zhes
T02D2509:254b-1: pa dkyil 'khor dang po'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2509:254b-2: tshul bzhin du thams cad du bris la de'i dbus
T02D2509:254b-3: su rdo rje rtse lnga pa bris te /

T02D2509:254b-5: smos pa de bzhin du 'dir yang sngar bsnyen pa

T02D2509:254b-7: / dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas zhes pa
T02D2509:254b-8: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang po'i dam tshig gi
T02D2509:254b-9: dkyil 'khor bzhin du bris la der so so rang
T02D2509:254b-10: rang gi phyag rgya'am mtshan ma bzhag ste /

T02D2509:254b-13: rdo rje'i 'khor lo 'jug pa dag / bstan dang sgrub pa de bzhin te //
T02D2509:254b-15: las kyi rdo rje'i 'khor lo ni dkyil 'khor te /
T02D2509:254b-16: ye shes thob par 'gyur ba'i rgyu //
T02D2509:254b-18: dkyil 'khor der dang po 'jug pa dang dkyil 'khor mthong bar bstan pa dang /
T02D2509:254b-19: dkyil 'khor mthong nas grub pa bsgrub par byas na
T02D2509:254b-20: rnal 'byor gyi rtog pa thams cad las grub pa

T02D2509:254b-28: rtog pa gzhan las 'byung ba'i rgyur 'gyur zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2509:254b-29: dkyil 'khor bri ba de bzhin te //

T02D2509:254b-32: du bris nas dkyil 'khor der zhugs te zhi ba
T02D2509:254b-33: dang rgyas pa la sogs pa'i las rnams slob dpon
T02D2509:254b-34: dang slob ma thams cad kyis brtson 'grus brtan par

T02D2509:254b-43: dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas ma bsgrubs kyang las thams

T02D2509:255a-1: na sgrub pa ma byas kyang las su rung ba'o //

T02D2509:255a-4: su bya ba rnams ci bya ba yang rung ste

T02D2509:255a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das la nam mkha'i mdzod byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to //

T02D2509:255a-16: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rnam pa sna
T02D2509:255a-18: sngags kyi don ni aom zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no //

T02D2509:255a-20: du gyur pas de las thams cad 'byung ba ste

T02D2509:255a-24: 'khor thams cad la zhes pa sngags de bklags pas

T02D2509:255a-26: byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs pa thams cad la mchod

T02D2509:255a-28: // rdo rje 'khor lo bzhin du bri //

T02D2509:255a-33: phyogs bzhir sangs rgyas bzhi bzhugs par bya ste shar
T02D2509:255a-34: phyogs su mi bskyod pa bzhugs pa nas byang phyogs
T02D2509:255a-35: su gdon mi za ba bzhugs pa'i bar du'o //

T02D2509:255a-37: pas grva bzhir byang chub sems dpa' bzhi rnams ma

T02D2509:255a-41: do // du bya'o // de nas der dang po
T02D2509:255a-42: slob dpon 'jug par bya ba'i cho ga bstan pa
T02D2509:255b-0: do // du bya'o // / dang po slob dpon 'jug @255b pa ni //
T02D2509:255b-1: zhes mchod pa mchog gi phyag rgya 'og nas 'byung ba bcings la 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2509:255b-2: rdo rje thams cad rab tu bya //
T02D2509:255b-3: zhes dkyil 'khor der zhugs nas lha so so'i rnam

T02D2509:255b-8: to zhes bya ba lta bu'o //

T02D2509:255b-11: cho ga dang ldan pas nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya chen po la sogs 'grub bo //
T02D2509:255b-12: de bzhin du slob ma yang bcug nas zhes slob dpon bzhin du 'jug pa'i don to //
T02D2509:255b-13: rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po 'di brjod la zhes bya ba'i snying po ni /

T02D2509:255b-22: dkyil 'khor yid kyis bris la der slob dpon rang
T02D2509:255b-23: yang zhugs la slob ma yang gzhug par yid kyis
T02D2509:255b-24: te tshig 'di dag brjod cig /'di dag thams cad

T02D2509:255b-31: cig / de bzhin du grub pa thams cad 'byung

T02D2509:255b-34: gi dkyil 'khor dang po bzhin du bris la der
T02D2509:255b-35: zhugs te dam tshig 'di bsgo shig /'byung ba kun
T02D2509:255b-36: la nam mkha' ni 'byung ba chen po lnga'o zhes
T02D2509:255b-37: pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi las 'dod pa'i yan

T02D2509:255b-41: to // de ltar 'dod nam mkha' las 'byung bas

T02D2509:256a-18: byams pas kyang rtog pa 'dir rang gi snying po

T02D2509:256a-29: // // bris la / de'i dbus su byams pa ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du bri'o //

T02D2509:256a-33: rnams byang shar gyi grva nas rim pa bzhin du

T02D2509:256a-43: tshig go // de nas go chas go bskon to
T02D2509:256a-44: zhes pa aom tum zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod la
T02D2509:256b-0: tshig go // / go cha'i @256b phyag rgya gong
T02D2509:256b-1: du smos pa nyid kyis lte ba dang snying ga
T02D2509:256b-2: la sogs par mdud pa bcing ngo //

T02D2509:256b-4: tshul gong ma bzhin du bris la slob dpon dang

T02D2509:256b-6: du byas la zhugs shig / de nas sems can

T02D2509:256b-21: bzhi bcom pa yang byams pa chen po bsgoms pas

T02D2509:256b-23: bslab po zhes pa las kyi dkyil 'khor gong ma

T02D2509:256b-31: rgyas pa la sogs pa'i las rnams bdag gar dad pa'i cho ga dang sbyar zhing /
T02D2509:256b-32: byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin te bsgrub bo //
T02D2509:256b-34: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la rdo rje
T02D2509:256b-35: rig pa dam pa la sogs pas mgos phyag 'tshal

T02D2509:257a-1: ba su de ba zhes bya'o //
T02D2509:257a-2: 'dir ni rdo rje sgyu mar btags so //
T02D2509:257a-3: tshangs pa ni phas mchod ces kyang bya ste 'dir ni rdo rje mi smra bar btags so //
T02D2509:257a-4: sa nad gzhon nu ni ka rti ka ste lha
T02D2509:257a-5: chen po'i sras te 'dir ni rdo rje dril bu
T02D2509:257a-6: ra btags so // dbang po ni brgya byin te 'dir ni rdo rje 'thab char btags so //
T02D2509:257a-7: de nas rdo rje rig pa dam pas /
T02D2509:257a-8: rang gi snying po gsungs pa /

T02D2509:257a-10: rdo rje sgyu mas gsungs pa aom nas phat kyi bar du'o //
T02D2509:257a-11: rdo rje mi smra bas gsungs pa /
T02D2509:257a-13: rdo rje dril bus gsungs pa aom nas phat kyi bar du'o //
T02D2509:257a-14: rdo rje 'thab chas gsungs pa aom nas tram gi bar du'o //
T02D2509:257a-15: de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste zhes
T02D2509:257a-16: pa dkyil 'khor ji tsam nus pa zlum por byas

T02D2509:257a-27: dbus su bzhag la phyogs bzhir lha gzhan dag dgod
T02D2509:257a-29: der gzhan yang rim gyis thams cad bri'am bzhag pa'am

T02D2509:269b-26: dbus su rnam par snang mdzad byang chub mchog gi

T02D2509:271a-16: badzra drishti zhes bya ba dag go //

T02D2509:271a-18: badzra drishti ma ta zhes pa ste /

T02D2509:271a-21: 'bar ba'i lta ba'i snying po ni /

T02D2509:271a-28: khro bo'i lta bas thams cad la mngon par spyad ces pa'i don to //

T02D2509:274b-31: la med pas na bla na med do //
T02D2509:274b-32: rdo rje chos ni glur blangs pas //
T02D2509:274b-33: zhes pa padma'i rigs la bstod pa ste /
T02D2509:274b-34: theg pa gsum gyi lam ston cing sgrogs pas na glu blangs pas don sgrub ces bya'o //
T02D2509:274b-35: rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur //
T02D2509:274b-36: zhes pa las kyi rigs la bstod pa ste /
T02D2509:274b-37: ye shes kyis byin gyis brlab pa'i las ni rdo
T02D2509:274b-38: rje las te gong ma'i rdo rje smos pa rnams
T02D2509:274b-39: kyang de bzhin du sbyar ro //
T02D2509:274b-40: las ni mchod pa sna tshogs dang sems can gyi don sna tshogs mdzad par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2509:274b-41: 'di brtsams te dga' ba dang dbang bskur ba dang
T02D2509:274b-42: zhes bya ba bstod pa 'di brtsams te dga' ba'i
T02D2509:274b-43: mchod pa byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin rdo
T02D2509:274b-45: byang chub kyi yan lag gi phreng ba'i rang bzhin gyis dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2509:274b-46: dam pa'i chos sgrogs pa'i glu'i mchod pa 'di rnams
T02D2509:274b-47: kyis de bzhin gshegs pa yang 'grub na gzhan sa
T02D2509:274b-48: pa'i grub pa rnams lta ci smos /

T02D2509:275a-1: do zhes pa de lta bu'i mchod pa ni sangs

T02D2509:275a-3: par 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin te bde bar 'gyur ba

T02D2509:275a-6: de ltar byin gyis brlabs pa'i spyi bo'i tshogs bshad
T02D2509:275a-7: zin nas phyag na rdo rje'i byin gyis brlab pa
T02D2509:275a-8: la sogs pa khyad par du gsungs pa /

T02D2509:275a-10: la sogs pa 'byung ba ni zhes bya ba dag
T02D2509:275a-11: go // nyin re ji lta bu'i dus sngon du zhes pa ni gong ma bshad pa bzhin no //
T02D2509:275a-12: rdo rje byin brlab la sogs sbyor //
T02D2509:275a-13: zhes bya ba snying gar rdo rje byin gyis brlab
T02D2509:275a-14: pa nas spyi bor las kyi rdo rjes byin gyis
T02D2509:275a-15: brlab pa'i bar du gong du rigs bzhir byin gyis
T02D2509:275a-16: brlab pa'i sbyor bas bdag nges par byin gyis brlabs
T02D2509:275a-17: la bdag rang phyag na rdo rje nyid du rigs
T02D2509:275a-18: bzhis byin gyis brlabs par gyur to zhes pa'i rnal
T02D2509:275a-19: 'byor dang ldan par bya'o zhes gsungs pa /
T02D2509:275a-20: sems dpa'i byin brlabs rnal 'byor ldan //
T02D2509:275a-22: de nas rdo rje bcings pas rdo rje rtse lnga
T02D2509:275a-23: pa lag na bzung ste dgug pa dang gzhug pa
T02D2509:275a-24: dang 'ching ba dang dbab par bya'o zhes gsungs pa
T02D2509:275a-25: rdo rje dang bcas te rdo rje 'bebs sogs rnal
T02D2509:275a-26: 'byor gyis bya'o zhes pa'i tshig gi lhag mas sdud
T02D2509:275a-27: do // de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis su
T02D2509:275a-28: bya ste rdo rje gzung bas phyag na rdo rje
T02D2509:275a-29: nyid kyis phyag rgya bcing bas bcings te byin gyis
T02D2509:275a-31: rdo rje khu tshur rdo rjer bcas //
T02D2509:275a-33: gnyis byas zhes bya ba ni khu tshur gnyis su phye ba'o //
T02D2509:275a-34: phyag rgya'i chog zhes bya ba ni rdo rje h'um
T02D2509:275a-35: ka ra'i phyag rgya nyid de rdo rje khu tshur
T02D2509:275a-36: mthe'u chung sbrel la dpung pa bsnol te mdzub mo
T02D2509:275a-37: bsgreng ba'i gong du smos pa'o //
T02D2509:275a-38: phyag rgya bcing ba de byang chub sems 'dod pa'i
T02D2509:275a-39: rang bzhin de nyid bdag nyid yin no zhes bsgoms
T02D2509:275a-40: nas phyag rgya bcing ngo zhes gsungs pa /
T02D2509:275a-41: 'dod pa bdag ces bsgoms nas so //
T02D2509:275a-43: phyag rgya de nyid dang sbyar ba'i snying po gsungs pa ;
T02D2509:275a-44: takki dza ho zhes pa ste 'dod pa'i khro bo'i rang bzhin don gong du smos pa bzhin no //
T02D2509:275a-45: snying po smos pa'i zhar la de'i sgrub pa'i cho ga tshig gzhan yang gsungs pa /
T02D2509:275a-46: de nas 'di sgrub pa gzhan yang zhes bya ba dag go //
T02D2509:275a-47: rdo rje bcing bas rtag gzung ste //
T02D2509:275a-48: zhes bya ba ni rang gi rnam par grol ba'i
T02D2509:275b-0: mtshan ma rdo rje rtse lnga pa @275b rdo rje
T02D2509:275b-1: bcing ba'i chang par gzhug 'dod pa thams cad dbang
T02D2509:275b-2: ba zhes pa byang chub kyi sems mngon du bya
T02D2509:275b-3: ba la dbang ba'am 'dod pa rnam lnga ci dgar
T02D2509:275b-5: 'dod pa'i gzugs dang zhes pa ji ltar 'dod pa'i lus su 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2509:275b-6: 'dod pa'i tshe dang zhes pa ji srid du gson ba de srid du 'tsho'o //
T02D2509:275b-7: 'dod pa'i bdag po zhes pa sems can gang la dbang bar 'dod pa de'i bdag por 'gyur ro //
T02D2509:275b-8: kun du 'gro ba ni phyogs bcur dga' ma gur 'gro ba'o //
T02D2509:275b-9: de nas phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rab
T02D2509:275b-10: tu bya ba 'byung ba ni zhes pa de bzhin
T02D2509:275b-11: gshegs pa lnga rnams kyi phreng ba'i dbu rgyan gyi
T02D2509:275b-12: dbang bskur ba ste gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2509:275b-13: sku'i dbu rgyan gyi spyi bor ni rnam par snang
T02D2509:275b-14: mdzad kyi sku'i phyag rgya mthe bo skyil mo krung
T02D2509:275b-15: bcas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2509:275b-16: de bzhin du dpral ba dang g-yas dang ltag pa dang g-yon du yang gung mo rdo rje dang /
T02D2509:275b-19: gung mod dpral ba rnams rim bzhin du mi bskyod pa dang /
T02D2509:275b-22: gdon mi za bar grub pa'i phyag rgya re re
T02D2509:275b-23: zhing yang snying po 'di lan re brjod la byin
T02D2509:275b-24: gyis brlab bo // phyag rgya de lnga'i mtshan nyid zhib tu ni gong du bshad pa yin no //
T02D2509:275b-25: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ratna aa bhi she
T02D2509:275b-26: ka aa:zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams nyid
T02D2509:275b-27: rin po che ste des dbang bskur zhes bya ba'i
T02D2509:275b-28: don to // phyag na rdo rje'i ting gi sbyor
T02D2509:275b-29: ba gsungs pa de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2509:275b-30: cad kyi zhes pa dag go //
T02D2509:275b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes dag bskyed
T02D2509:275b-32: pa'i rgyu ting nge 'dzin 'og nas 'byung ba sngon
T02D2509:275b-33: du bya zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2509:275b-34: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' thams cad ces pa /
T02D2509:275b-35: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas
T02D2509:275b-36: dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rang bzhin
T02D2509:275b-37: nyid yin pa de ltar bdag kyang rdo rje sems
T02D2509:275b-38: dpa' dang tha mi dad pas na thams cad kyi
T02D2509:275b-39: rang bzhin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed la dgug pa
T02D2509:275b-40: dang gzhug pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan
T02D2509:275b-42: de la dgug pa ni thams cad kyi bdag nyid bdag gi rang bzhin du dbang du bya'o //
T02D2509:275b-44: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin smos pa'o //
T02D2509:276a-2: de nas mchod pa'i cho ga gsungs pa /
T02D2509:276a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar zhes pa dag go //
T02D2509:276a-4: phyag na rdo rje nyid kyi cha lugs ri mo'am
T02D2509:276a-5: byas pa'i spyan sngar bdag rang gis byin gyis brlab
T02D2509:276a-6: pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2509:276a-7: ting nge 'dzin byas nas gar thabs kyi phyag rgyas me tog dang dri dang /
T02D2509:276a-10: sogs pa'i sgras ni bdug pa nas mar me'i bar du'o //
T02D2509:276a-11: gsang ba'i mchod pa'i phyag rgyas dbul //
T02D2509:276a-12: zhes pa me tog la sogs pa dbul ba'i tshe
T02D2509:276a-13: gar thabs dang sbyar ba'i snyim pas dbul pa nyid
T02D2509:276a-15: gzhu 'dren pa tshul gyis su zhes pa phyag na
T02D2509:276a-16: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na bzhugs pa'i mdun
T02D2509:276a-17: rdo rje gzhu 'gengs pa'i lha mo ste mda' 'phen
T02D2509:276a-19: g-yas na lha mo k'i li k'i k'i la ste
T02D2509:276a-20: khu tshur gyi pad pas phyag na rdo rje la
T02D2509:276a-21: 'khyud pa lta bu ba'i tshul ston pa'o //
T02D2509:276a-22: rgyab tu chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan thogs pa'i lha
T02D2509:276a-23: mo ste rdo rje tshur bcings la g-yon pa'i lag
T02D2509:276a-24: ngar bsgreng ba'i gru mor g-yas pas gzung ba ltar
T02D2509:276a-25: bya'o // g-yon na rdo rje bsnyems pa'i lha mo ste /
T02D2509:276a-26: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis mkhal ltag tu gtad de bsnyems pa'i 'jum pas g-yon du 'dud do //
T02D2509:276a-27: de nas phyag na rdo rje la bstod pa'i tshig
T02D2509:276a-28: 'og nas 'byung ba rdo rje'i glu por la dang
T02D2509:276a-29: / sha rdza la sogs pa dang spyar te bstod do zhes gsungs pa /
T02D2509:276a-30: rdo rje bstod pa'i glu brjod cing //
T02D2509:276a-32: rdo rje'i bstod pa ni phyag na rdo rje la bstod ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2509:276a-33: gzugs la sogs pa'i bde ba zhes pa ni 'dod
T02D2509:276a-34: pa rnam lnga'i bde bas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i
T02D2509:276a-35: sems can yid rab tu bde bar gyur pa de
T02D2509:276a-36: dag thams cad ni rab tu dgyes pa zhes bya
T02D2509:276a-37: ba'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' khyod la
T02D2509:276a-38: 'dul te / rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ni dga'
T02D2509:276a-39: zhing bde ba thams cad kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir
T02D2509:276a-40: 'dul te / ro // bdag la yang grub pa myur du stsol du stsol cig ces bskul pa /
T02D2509:276a-41: kun dga' bde byed de ring bdag la gyur //
T02D2509:276a-43: dga' ba kun ni byang chub sems so //
T02D2509:276a-44: de'i rgyus bde bar 'gyur ba chos kyis bde 'gyur ba /
T02D2509:276a-45: de ring bdag gis thob par gyur cig ces so /
T02D2509:276a-46: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyang myur du grub cig ces smras pa /
T02D2509:276a-47: dam pa dang po ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste
T02D2509:276b-0: sems can @276b thams cad kyi gdod ma mchog yin
T02D2509:276b-1: pa'i phyir ro // de kho na'i tshig thams cad
T02D2509:276b-2: smra zhes pa mi slu ba bden pa'i tshig smra
T02D2509:276b-4: de ltar lan cig byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2509:276b-5: de nas sgrubs shing ces grub pa rab 'bring zhi
T02D2509:276b-6: ba dang rgyas pa la sogs pa ci sgrub kyang
T02D2509:276b-7: rung dang por byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa
T02D2509:276b-8: bya'o // de nas nyin gcig bzhin du byin gyis
T02D2509:276b-9: brlab pa la sogs pa nyin re byas na zhes
T02D2509:276b-10: pa la sogs pa'i sgras ni dbang dang ting nge
T02D2509:276b-11: 'dzin dang mchod pa dang phyag rgya chen po la
T02D2509:276b-12: sogs pa bsgom pa'am rdo rje tshig la sogs pa
T02D2509:276b-13: bya'o // bzlas pa bya'o // nyin re la na
T02D2509:276b-14: re zhes bya ba ni nye bar gzung ba'i tshig
T02D2509:276b-15: ste nyin re dus gsum du byas kyang nyes pa
T02D2509:276b-16: bya'o // bzlas pa bya'o // med do / phar
T02D2509:276b-17: mo rnams brtsams te ston pa byed de zhes pa
T02D2509:276b-18: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sku gzungs 'od
T02D2509:276b-19: mi gsal bar ston pa nas brtsams te /
T02D2509:276b-20: rab tu gsal bar mngon du ston par byed pa'i bar du 'gyur ro //
T02D2509:276b-21: de la sngags pa la tshig tu yang smra'o ;
T02D2509:276b-22: / byams pa dang mchod pa yang byed do //
T02D2509:276b-23: sngags pa de yang de yang de dag la mchog pa byed do //
T02D2509:276b-24: 'jigs pa med pa dang zhes pa sngags pa de
T02D2509:276b-25: rgyal pa dang rkun po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa
T02D2509:276b-27: zad pa med pa ni tshe dang mthu la sogs pa gtan zang par mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2509:276b-28: god pa med pa ni de dag mthar gyis zad par mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2509:276b-29: 'jigs pa med pa ni cig car du mi 'jigs pa'o //
T02D2509:276b-30: rang yang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la sogs pa thams
T02D2509:276b-31: cad kyi gzugs su 'gyur ba'o zhes pa bdag gi
T02D2509:276b-32: lus nyid sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i gzugs su 'gyur
T02D2509:276b-33: ba'o // gong ma ni bdag gi lus las kun 'byung bar ston pa'o //
T02D2509:276b-34: mig gis 'das pa dang 'ongs pa dang da ltar
T02D2509:276b-35: gyi shes pa mthong zhes sbyar te ji ltar mthong
T02D2509:276b-36: zhe na gzugs thams cad dang yi ge rnams kyis
T02D2509:276b-38: 'das pa'i dus na ji ltar gyur pa de thams cad da ltar gzugs su snang ngam /
T02D2509:276b-39: yi ge'i 'bru rnams kyis ston pa mig gis mthong nas 'das pa'o shes pa mthong bar 'gyur to //
T02D2509:276b-40: de bzhin du 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi yang sbyar ro //
T02D2509:276b-41: thams cad thos shing zhes pa grog sbur gyi skad yan chad thos pa'o //
T02D2509:276b-42: rang gi lce smra'o zhes pa dus gsum gyi legs nyes rang gi lce las sgar 'byung ngo //
T02D2509:277a-1: zhes lhun gyis grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang sbar te /
T02D2509:277a-2: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtsug lag go //
T02D2509:277a-3: sil snyan ni rda la sogs pa shes pa'o //
T02D2509:277a-5: mtshon 'debs pa ni phub 'jur dang gsor mkhas pa'o //
T02D2509:277a-6: rnam par shes pa ni rol mo dang rgyas po la sogs pa sna tshogs shes pa'o //
T02D2509:277a-7: bzo shes pa ni lo ma 'dar ba dang /
T02D2509:277a-8: ri mo la sogs pa shes pa'o //
T02D2509:277a-9: mkhan rnams shes pa ni chos dang glang po che'i
T02D2509:277a-10: chos dang mda' gzhu la sogs la sogs pa byed
T02D2509:277a-11: pa'o // de dag ma bslab par shes pa ni lhun gyis grub pa'o //
T02D2509:277a-12: nyin gcig cing gzugs chen po dang zhes pa nyin gcig bzhin de dag 'phel bar 'gyur pa'o //
T02D2509:277a-13: nyin gcig bzhin thams cad mngon par shes par 'gyur
T02D2509:277a-14: ro zhes pa dus thams cad du bdag la dge
T02D2509:277a-15: sdig ci 'ong ba mngon par shes par 'gyur ro
T02D2509:277a-16: // mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang zhes
T02D2509:277a-17: bya ba byin gyis brlab pa la sogs bya ba
T02D2509:277a-18: ste bsgom pa'am bzlas pa rab tu gus par byas
T02D2509:277a-19: na sgrub pa'i tshig gzhan ma byas kyang 'grub pa
T02D2509:277a-20: 'grub zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2509:277a-21: de la sgrub pa'i rab tu bya ba 'byung ste
T02D2509:277a-22: zhes pa grub pa rnams sgrub pa'i le'u ste snying
T02D2509:277a-23: po la sogs pa ni sngags dang rang gi sangs
T02D2509:277a-24: rgyas kyi sku rjes su dran pa phyag rgya chen
T02D2509:277a-25: po'i rnal 'byor byas la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
T02D2509:277a-26: sngar phyag rgya bsgom zhing snying po dang phyag rgya
T02D2509:277a-27: dang sngas dang rig pa rnams gang sgrub pa de
T02D2509:277a-28: mngon du bya zhing bzlas te sgrub po //
T02D2509:277a-29: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni badzra ba de ces brjod pa'o //
T02D2509:277a-30: phyag rgya ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'o //
T02D2509:277a-31: sngags dang rig pa ni rgyud 'dir gsal bar ma gsungs pas rgyud gzhan las 'byung bar sbyar ro //
T02D2509:277a-32: de nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud las ni snying po la
T02D2509:277a-33: sogs pa bzhi yang dkyil 'khor gyi las bye brag
T02D2509:277a-34: las gyur te dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa ni
T02D2509:277a-35: snying po'o // dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i sngas ni phyag rgya'o //
T02D2509:277a-36: chos kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa ni sngags so //
T02D2509:277a-37: las kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa ni rig pa'o zhes gsungs na /
T02D2509:277a-38: rgyud 'di las ni dkyil 'khor bzhi gsungs mod kyi /
T02D2509:277a-39: dkyil 'khor re re zhing snying po re re yang
T02D2509:277a-40: gsungs pas na snying po gcig po gsal bar gsungs
T02D2509:277b-0: la / gzhan 'dir mi @277b gsal ba rnams ni
T02D2509:277b-1: rgyud gzhan las 'byung ba dang spyang bar shes par
T02D2509:277b-2: la / bya'o // phyag na rdo rje bsgrub pa ni //
T02D2509:277b-3: zhes pa'i snying po dang phyag rgya la sogs pa
T02D2509:277b-4: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i ting de
T02D2509:277b-5: 'dzin la bzhugs shing lha chen po la sogs pa
T02D2509:277b-6: btul ba'i snying po ni thog ma nyid kyi skyil
T02D2509:277b-7: 'khor du gsungs pa dang sbyar ro //
T02D2509:277b-8: de'i 'og tu 'dod pa'i khro bo'i gzugs snying ga
T02D2509:277b-9: nas 'dod pa'i khro bo'i snying po ni takki h'um
T02D2509:277b-10: dza:zhes bya ba'o // sngags la sogs pa grangs bzhir
T02D2509:277b-11: ma tshang ba ni gong du smos pa bzhin du
T02D2509:277b-12: dza:zhes bya ba'o // sbyar ro // phyag na rdo

T02D2509:277b-14: snying po la sogs pa bzhi 'og nas 'gyur ba
T02D2509:277b-15: dza:zhes bya ba'o // sbyar ro // dang spyar ro
T02D2509:277b-16: // sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa'i rnal 'byor dang
T02D2509:277b-17: zhes pa rdo rje h'um ka ra'i sku phyag rgya
T02D2509:277b-18: bzhi par byin gyis brlab pa'o //

T02D2509:277b-24: du bdag rang byas la snying gar rdo rje rtse
T02D2509:277b-26: gong ma'i rnal 'byor gang byed kyang rung ste /

T02D2509:277b-38: rdo rje rtse lnga pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D2509:277b-39: bzhag par bsgoms pas sgrub po //
T02D2509:277b-40: phyi'i rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub pa ni zhes pa

T02D2509:277b-45: rdo rje rnams bsgrub pa ni //
T02D2509:278a-0: zhes pa lha chen po'i btsun mo @278a * //
T02D2509:278a-1: man chad sa 'og gi lha mo yan chad kyi

T02D2509:278a-3: sems can thams cad kyi rkun po dang gcan gzan

T02D2509:278a-5: snyam du yid la bya ba'am /
T02D2509:278a-6: bdag rang rdo rje 'bar ba srin po'i gzugs su brtsams te /

T02D2509:278a-9: 'byung ste zhes pa grub pa 'grub par 'gyur ba'i

T02D2509:278a-12: ji lta bus sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba de

T02D2509:278a-18: / / grub pa thams cad byed pa'i mchog ces pa ste /
T02D2509:278a-19: grub pa'i rgyu'i mchog ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //

T02D2509:278a-29: dbus su sku gzugs bris te /

T02D2509:278a-37: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams kyi ras ni so

T02D2509:278b-17: nas 'byung ba ni rtog pa thams cad du yang
T02D2509:278b-19: phyag na rdo rje'i glu tshig gis bzlas so zhes pa /

T02D2509:278b-21: chos kyi tshig gis khros pa chen po'i sgra gsal par bya ste zhes pa /

T02D2509:278b-27: mor bskyungs pa'o // de la ting nge 'dzin gyi
T02D2509:278b-28: ngag ni zhes pa mchu dang lce la sogs pa

T02D2509:278b-35: sha da ba la sogs pa'i glu //

T02D2509:278b-38: grong dga' ba ni glu'i ming ste grong dga' bar
T02D2509:278b-39: gtogs pa'i glu ke shi la sogs pa rnam pa
T02D2509:278b-40: gsum mo // rdo rje'i tshig bzlas rtog pa ru //
T02D2509:278b-41: zhes pa dag gi skabs su rdo rje'i tshig glu gong du smos pa dang sbyar te bzlas pa'o //
T02D2509:279a-0: sprin 'brug kyang ni h'um zhes pa sgra'i thog ma h'um gis @279a * //

T02D2509:279a-13: gnas dang srog chags thams cad ni //

T02D2509:279a-15: 'phrul gyi rta la sogs pa srog chags 'phrul bag
T02D2509:279a-16: can nam mi zad par sgrub pa ni so so

T02D2509:279a-25: bzlas pa'i don gyis mgon bzlas te //

T02D2509:279a-28: bsgrub po // khro bas mnyam par 'jog pas so //
T02D2509:279a-29: zhes pa khro bo'i sems rtse gcig tu gzhag pa'o //
T02D2509:279a-31: zhes pa'i snying po don ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par dmigs te bzlas pa'o //
T02D2509:279a-32: 'dod pa sgom zhing bzlas pas so //
T02D2509:279a-33: zhes pa 'dod pa ni byang chub kyi sems te

T02D2509:279a-35: phyir ro // aom zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa
T02D2509:279a-36: ste zhes phyag na rdo rje'i snying po aom zhes
T02D2509:279a-37: bya ba yang 'dod pa'i rang bzhin nyid du ston
T02D2509:279a-38: te bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid do //
T02D2509:279a-39: 'dod pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste des thams

T02D2509:279a-41: do // 'dod pa ni shin tu chags pa'o zhes pa 'dod pa ni byang chub kyi sems so //

T02D2509:279a-43: 'dod pa ni 'das pa'i don to zhes pa phyag
T02D2509:279a-44: na rdo rje'i snying po zlos pa'i tshe 'dod pa
T02D2509:279b-0: zhes bya ba @279b byang chub kyi sems de la
T02D2509:279b-1: dmigs nas bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D2509:279b-2: de bas na 'dod pa ni slob pa'i don to zhes bshad do //
T02D2509:279b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang slu bar
T02D2509:279b-4: mi nus so zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa las
T02D2509:279b-5: mthu che ba gzhan med pas kyang bar chad byed

T02D2509:279b-13: mar me yang thal mo de nyid las mthe bong
T02D2509:279b-14: bsnyams pas snyim pa'i kha g-yogs la thor to mar

T02D2509:279b-23: snying po dang phyag rgya dang sngags dang rig pa'i
T02D2509:279b-24: rang bzhin du gyur pa thams cad la yang mchod
T02D2509:279b-25: par 'gyur ro // bsod nams chung ba rnams kyis
T02D2509:279b-26: dkyil 'khor gang 'dod pa che chung ji tsam du

T02D2509:279b-29: bsod nams med pa'i sems can gyis //
T02D2509:279b-31: grub pa myur du thob par 'gyur ba'i thabs su gsungs pa /

T02D2509:279b-34: ting nge 'dzin ni sems rtse gcig pa ste las su rung ba'o //
T02D2509:279b-35: chos sbyin pa ni lha dang mi la sogs pa la dam pa'i chos bsnyad pa'o //
T02D2509:279b-36: sogs pa'i sgras ni chos bri ba dang mchod pa la sogs pa mos pa spyod pa'i tshe /
T02D2509:279b-37: chos bcu spyad pa rnams gzung ngo //
T02D2509:279b-38: rgya chen tshul rnams zhes pa theg pa chen po'i mdo sde rnams so //
T02D2509:279b-39: dad la gnas te zhes pa dkon mchog la sems dad pas mchod pa'o //
T02D2509:279b-41: zhes pa sems can smin pa dang grol ba la
T02D2509:279b-42: chags pa de lta bu spangs te 'dod pa dang

T02D2509:280a-5: chags pa bas dam par gyur pa'i phyir mchog go
T02D2509:280a-6: bya'o // // ci nus 'dod la chags pas na //
T02D2509:280a-7: zhes pa la byang chub kyi sems 'dod pa la
T02D2509:280a-8: ci nus par bsgoms na grub pa chen po phyag

T02D2509:280a-16: sangs rgyas la rtag tu mchod cing de bzhin du

T02D2509:280a-40: dkyil 'khor du rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan sngar

T02D2509:280b-16: du sngags lan re brjod cing bzhag la /

T02D2509:280b-18: gi phyag rgya bcings te bzhag nas sngags 'og nas

T02D2509:280b-24: gyi dbang gis rnam pa du mar 'gyur mod kyi

T02D2509:280b-29: slob ma'i lag par rdo rje rgya gram mam /
T02D2509:280b-30: rtse lnga pa byin la 'og nas 'byung ba'i snying po stong bzlas pa'i bum pas dbang bskur ro //
T02D2509:280b-31: rdo rje chu zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i chu'o //

T02D2509:280b-33: padmo lag tu byin nas zhes bya ba dag go //

T02D2509:280b-37: go // dbang bskur ba thams cad rang rang gi
T02D2509:280b-38: dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes
T02D2509:281a-1: dpon gyis dkyil 'khor thams cad du btsud de zhes bya ba dag go //
T02D2509:281a-2: slob dpon gyis dbang thob zin pa dam tshig gso ba'am bgegs zhi bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2509:281a-3: bdag rang slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'dod na /
T02D2509:281a-4: dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin du bris la phyag na rdo rje rang gi slob dpon du brtags te /
T02D2509:281a-5: rang gis rang dbang bskur bar yang rung ngo zhes gsungs pa /
T02D2509:281a-6: phyag na rdo rje slob dpon du bya ste zhes bya ba dag go //
T02D2509:281a-7: de ltar slob dpon gyi dbang mnos nas rigs so
T02D2509:281a-8: so'i slob dpon gyi brtul zhugs nges par sbyad dgos
T02D2509:281a-9: te / de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil
T02D2509:281a-10: 'khor du slob dpon gyi dbang bskur pa'i brtul zhugs
T02D2509:281a-11: te / gsungs pa / de bzhin gshegs pa'i slob
T02D2509:281a-12: dpon ni zla ba gcig gi bar du zhes bya
T02D2509:281a-13: te / gsungs pa / ba dag go // dge
T02D2509:281a-14: slong dang dge tshul la sogs pas ni rang gi
T02D2509:281a-15: bslab pa ma nyams par bya ba dang /
T02D2509:281a-16: nyams pa gsos te sdom pa la gnas par bya'o //
T02D2509:281a-17: khyim pa ni zla ba gcig tu khyim gyi chos
T02D2509:281a-18: spangs te changs par spyod pa'i sngom pa gzung ngo
T02D2509:281a-19: // dus gsum du mchod cing bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D2509:281a-20: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi spyi'i slob dpon gyi brtul zhugs gsungs pa /
T02D2509:281a-21: zla ba phyed kyi bar du nyin re zhing zhes bya ba dag go //
T02D2509:281a-22: byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa //
T02D2509:281a-23: zhes pa la sogs pa'i sgras ni dbang bskur ba
T02D2509:281a-24: dang ting nge 'dzin dang mchod pa dag gzung ngo
T02D2509:281a-25: // kyo ba tang gis bkug ste zhes pa byin
T02D2509:281a-26: gyis brlab pa'i phyir dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang
T02D2509:281a-27: bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2509:281a-28: byas nas dus gsum du skyo ba ma skyes pa'i
T02D2509:281a-30: 'dir brtul zhugs dus ji srid du sbyad pa dang
T02D2509:281a-31: bzlas pa dus du bya ba gsal bar ma gsungs
T02D2509:281a-32: mod kyi de bzhin zhes bya ba'i sgras ni gong
T02D2509:281a-33: du dus gsum du sgrub cing zla ba gcig tu
T02D2509:281a-35: phyag na rdo rje yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi nang du 'dus mod kyi /
T02D2509:281a-36: rgyud 'chad pa'i gtso bo ni de'i brtul zhugs lo gas shig tu gsungs pa /
T02D2509:281a-37: nang par langs nas nyin re zhing //
T02D2509:281a-39: sngags pa rang khrus byas dri gtsang mas byugs gos 'tsher ba bgos /
T02D2509:281a-40: dpung rgyan dang dbu rgyan la sogs pas chas te glu la sogs pas mchod do //
T02D2509:281b-0: @281b gsang ba'i mchod pa ni badzra l'a sye la sogs pa'o //
T02D2509:281b-1: me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa ni me tog
T02D2509:281b-2: dang dri dang bdug pa dang mar me dag go
T02D2509:281b-3: // 'dod pa'i dngos pos bcom ldan 'das dang bdag
T02D2509:281b-4: la mchod pa bya ste zhes pa byang chub sems
T02D2509:281b-5: dpa' la bsgom pa'i nan tan gyis mchod pas mchod
T02D2509:281b-7: dam tshig chen po'i de kho na ci 'dod pa bzlas zhes pa sa ma ya ho //
T02D2509:281b-8: su ra ta stvam zhes gong du smos pa ci rigs par bzlas so //
T02D2509:281b-9: 'dod pa'i yon tan phyi dro'i bar du spyod la
T02D2509:281b-10: zhes pa dad pa dang brtson 'grus la sogs pa
T02D2509:281b-11: dbang po lnga la nan tan du bya'o //
T02D2509:281b-12: de nas las kyi rigs kyi brtul zhugs gsungs pa
T02D2509:281b-13: zla ba phyed du smyon par bsgyur nas zhes bya
T02D2509:281b-14: ba dag go // chos thams cad la mi rtog par bsgom pa'i phyir ram /
T02D2509:281b-15: bdag rang nga rgyal bcag pa'i phyir smyon par bsgyur ro //
T02D2509:281b-16: yang na chos thams cad rten cing 'brel te 'byung
T02D2509:281b-17: ba las kyi rigs kyi slob dpon brtul zhugs de
T02D2509:281b-18: 'dra bas 'grub par bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen te
T02D2509:281b-19: bka' stsal pas rigs pa'i gtan tshigs smos mi dgos
T02D2509:281b-20: te / phabs dang nas ba sres pa'i rgyu las
T02D2509:281b-21: ra ro ba 'byung ba rigs pas sgrub pa med
T02D2509:281b-22: mod kyi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos kyis
T02D2509:281b-23: te / de lta bu'o // phyag rgya'i gar byas te zhes brkyang bskum dang /
T02D2509:281b-26: thal mo bskor ba la sogs pa gar thabs byed pa'o //
T02D2509:281b-27: yid la de bzhin gshegs pa bris la zhes pa
T02D2509:281b-28: nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa'i cha lugs yid
T02D2509:281b-29: kyis bsam pa'o // brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas zhes
T02D2509:281b-30: pa rang gi snying po brgya rtsa brgyad nyin gcig
T02D2509:281b-31: kyis bsam pa'o // bzhin bzlas so // 'di yang
T02D2509:281b-32: dus ji srid du bya ba nges par ma gsungs
T02D2509:281b-33: pa ni gong du phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs
T02D2509:281b-34: smos pa'i dus dang sbyar bar rigs te /
T02D2509:281b-35: slob dpon mkhas pa dag 'chad pa'i tshul gyis na
T02D2509:281b-36: bshad pa'i rigs pa gsal bar ma byung pa ni
T02D2509:281b-37: gong du smos ma thag pa'i tshul dang sbyar ba'i
T02D2509:281b-38: phyir ro // padmo'i rigs kyi brtul zhugs gsungs pa ;
T02D2509:281b-39: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te zhes pa dag go //
T02D2509:281b-40: rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa las 'byung ba'i gcin ni rdo rje'i chu'o zhes 'byung ste /
T02D2509:281b-41: rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i chu btung ngo zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2509:281b-42: ba'i lci ba cung zad zos nas zhes pa pu
T02D2509:281b-43: ri sha zhes bya ba'i sgra mi gtsang ba slad
T02D2509:282a-1: padmo'i rtsa ba la yang pu ru sha zhes bya
T02D2509:282a-2: ste rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa las pu ri
T02D2509:282a-3: sha ni padmo las byung ba'o zhes bshad pas na
T02D2509:282a-5: padmo'i rtsa ba cung zad bza' //
T02D2509:282a-7: de yang ye shes kyi dri ma bkru ba'i mtshan ma rdo rje'i chu btud ngo //
T02D2509:282a-8: cis kyang mi gos pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes
T02D2509:282a-9: kyi tshogs sgom pa'i mtshan la padmo'i rtsa ba bza'
T02D2509:282a-10: bar bstan pa'o // de ltar byed cing zhag bdun
T02D2509:282a-11: gyi bar du sems rtse gcig tu byas pas nyin
T02D2509:282a-12: gcig kyang rang gi snying po gong du smos pa
T02D2509:282a-14: de nas rin po che'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba gsungs pa /
T02D2509:282a-15: nyin re bzhin rang la dbang bskur nas zhes pa dag go //
T02D2509:282a-16: dbang bskur ba'i sngags gong du smos pa nyid kyis
T02D2509:282a-17: nyi ma brgyad kyi bar du nyin re dbang bskur
T02D2509:282a-18: ba cho ga gong ma bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2509:282a-19: rgyal po lta bur sgom zhes pa ni bdag kyang chos kyi rgyal po zhes nga rgyal bskyed pa'o //
T02D2509:282a-20: cho ga de ltar byas pas slob dpon du grub pa'i yon tan gsungs pa /
T02D2509:282a-21: de ltar slob dpon gyis grub pa thams cad dang zhes pa dag go //
T02D2509:282a-22: de nas snying po dang phyag rgya la sogs pa
T02D2509:282a-23: las sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad de de la re
T02D2509:282a-26: snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas //
T02D2509:282a-28: sngar bsnyen pa tshul bzhin du byas la zhi ba
T02D2509:282a-29: dang rgyas pa la sogs pa'i las byed pa'i tshe
T02D2509:282a-30: brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas 'grub bo //
T02D2509:282a-31: phyag rgya grub pa gsungs pa /
T02D2509:282a-32: rdo rje phyag rgya chen po bcings nas zhes bya ba dag go //
T02D2509:282a-33: rdo rjes byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir phyag rgya chen
T02D2509:282a-34: po ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po ste lha
T02D2509:282a-36: de byas nas ting nge 'dzin mngon du khugs nas snying po brgya stong bzlas na dam tshig dang /
T02D2509:282a-37: las kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa bcings pa tsam
T02D2509:282a-38: gyis zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sogs las thams
T02D2509:282a-39: cad dang / 'jig rten gyi grub pa gter la sogs pa dang /
T02D2509:282a-40: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i grub pa phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa dag kyang 'grub cing /
T02D2509:282a-41: pha rol sgrub tu gzhug na yang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2509:282a-42: sngags ni rdo rje tshig gis zhes pa dag ste
T02D2509:282b-0: sngar cho ga bzhin @282b 'bum bzlas na zhi ba
T02D2509:282b-1: la sogs pa las kun 'grub bo //
T02D2509:282b-2: rig pa'i sgrub pa gsungs pa /
T02D2509:282b-3: reg pa stong phrag brgya bzlas na //
T02D2509:282b-5: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po la sogs
T02D2509:282b-6: pa gsungs pa de nas snying po dang phyag rgya
T02D2509:282b-7: dang sngags dang rig pa rnams 'byung ste zhes pa'o
T02D2509:282b-8: // de la rdo rje sems dpa' ni nye bar
T02D2509:282b-9: ston par zad kyi lha rnams kyang snying po la
T02D2509:282b-10: sogs pa bzhir rig par bya ste rtog pa 'dir
T02D2509:282b-11: snying po la sogs pa bzhir ma tshang ba rnams
T02D2509:282b-12: kyang de nyid bsdus pa la sogs pa'i rgyud chen
T02D2509:282b-13: po gzhan las 'byung ba dang sbyar ro //
T02D2509:282b-14: snying po la sogs pa bzhis myur du 'grub pa na bskul pa'i cho ga gsungs pa /
T02D2509:282b-15: de nas snying po dag dang phyag rgya dang //
T02D2509:282b-17: rdo rje bzlas pa'i glus rdo rje'i tshig tu bzlas
T02D2509:282b-18: na zhes pa sgra med na ni glur yang mi
T02D2509:282b-19: rung la / rdo rje'i tshig ni sgra med par bzlas so zhes 'byung ste /
T02D2509:282b-20: 'gal ba gnyis cig car du brjod du brjod du
T02D2509:282b-21: mi rung ngo zhes zer ba la ji ltar sngags
T02D2509:282b-22: kyi tshig sgra med par brjod pa bzhin du rdo
T02D2509:282b-23: rje glu yang sgra med par yid kyis blang ba
T02D2509:282b-24: dang sngags su sbyar te glu yid kyis blangs du
T02D2509:282b-25: mi rung du zin na bslab kyang ji ltar bslab
T02D2509:282b-26: / go rims su phab ste khar yang ji ltar brjod do /
T02D2509:282b-27: de nas nas sngags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bskyab
T02D2509:282b-28: tu gsol zhes phyag na rdo rjes gsol ba de
T02D2509:282b-29: nas bcom ldan 'das la zhes bya ba dag go
T02D2509:282b-30: // sems can gdul ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni skye bo sngags kyi sgor gzud pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2509:282b-31: gzhan gyi yul du 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni
T02D2509:282b-32: ma mchis pa zhes 'og ma dang sbyar te bsgom
T02D2509:282b-33: pa'i bar chad du 'gyur ba'i yul rgyu ba'i sems
T02D2509:282b-34: ma mchis par byin gyis brlab par gsol zhes pa'i
T02D2509:282b-35: don to // de nas de bzhin du dbul po
T02D2509:282b-36: la sogs pa yang ma mchis par zhes 'og nas
T02D2509:282b-37: 'byung ba dang so sor sbyor cig /'dod pa chung
T02D2509:282b-38: ba zhes pa byang chub kyi sems med ces pa'o
T02D2509:282b-39: don to // // 'dod chags dang bral ba ni byang chub kyi sems la zhen pa'o //
T02D2509:282b-40: rab tu 'byung bar sems pa ni gcig tu 'khor
T02D2509:282b-41: ba las rab tu 'byung bar sems pa ste gzhan
T02D2509:282b-42: gyi don mi byed ces pa'i don to //
T02D2509:282b-43: skyon de rnams spangs nas yon tan 'di 'dra bar byin gyis brlab par gsol pa /
T02D2509:282b-44: mos pa'i bsam pa dang zhes bya ba dag go //
T02D2509:282b-45: mos pa'i bsam pa ni dkon mchog gsum la bsam pa thag pa nas dad pa'o //
T02D2509:283a-1: bsam par byed pa'i chos ni bdag dang gzhan gyi
T02D2509:283a-2: don mnyam par byed pa theg pa chen po'i chos
T02D2509:283a-4: sgrib pa yongs su byang bar zhes pa las dang
T02D2509:283a-5: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa yongs su byang bar byin
T02D2509:283a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la gsungs pa /
T02D2509:283a-8: dam tshig chen po'i de kho na 'di zhes bya ba dag go //
T02D2509:283a-9: dam tshig chen po ni skabs 'dir ye shes kyi
T02D2509:283a-10: rang bzhin te thob par bya ba'i phyir na dam
T02D2509:283a-11: tshig go zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
T02D2509:283a-12: ye shes kyi rang bzhin de sems can gyi don
T02D2509:283a-13: sna tshogs la snying po dang phyag rgya la sogs
T02D2509:283a-14: pa rnam ba du mar sbyor ba yang mi slu
T02D2509:283a-15: ba'i phyir de kho na zhes bya'o //
T02D2509:283a-16: snying po dang phyag rgya la sogs pa yang bsdu
T02D2509:283a-17: na lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rjer 'dus te
T02D2509:283a-20: sems kyi dkyil 'khor du snying po la sogs pa thams cad gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2509:283a-21: de ltar lus la sogs pa rdo rje thams cad
T02D2509:283a-22: kyang khyod kyis skye bo ma lus pa 'dul ba'i
T02D2509:283a-24: gdul ba de dag gi don gyi phyir ded kyi byin gyis brlab ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2509:283a-25: sgrub pa po rnams la de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlab par bskul ba dang /
T02D2509:283a-26: byang chub kyi sems la chags pa med kyang sngags
T02D2509:283a-27: 'di brjod na 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa
T02D2509:283a-28: / de bas na sgrub pa po des dang por zhes pa dag go //
T02D2509:283a-29: de nas phyag na rdo rjes rtog pa 'di'i yon tan bsngags pa /
T02D2509:283a-30: sems can kun la phan phyir du //
T02D2509:283a-32: mnyam pa ru ni bsrungs nas so //
T02D2509:283a-33: zhes pa su 'di la nan tan byed pa thams
T02D2509:283a-34: cad 'dag gis mnyam par srung ngo zhes pa'i don
T02D2509:283a-35: to // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
T02D2509:283a-36: mdzad kyi rdzu 'phrul bstan nas phyag na rdo rje
T02D2509:283a-38: de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan las bzhengs te zhes bya ba dag go //
T02D2509:283a-39: khams gsum thams cad la sprul pa'i sku phra mos gang par byas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2509:283a-40: bla ma mang du thos pa'i man dag la //
T02D2509:283a-41: brten te mdo ru 'grel pa 'di bgyis pas //
T02D2509:283a-42: skye bo sgrib pa'i mun pas khebs pa rnams //
T02D2509:283a-43: sgrib byang rdo rje sems dpa'i thabs thob shog /'jig
T02D2509:283a-44: rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i 'grel pa mu
